Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This mask smells awesome, like mango and coconut in suntan lotion. My hair is normally very dry but feels so soft and moisturized after using this mask. My hair is much more manageable and less frizzy. I've started using this weekly and it keeps my hair from drying out.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Quality
Review: This is a fabulous conditioner mask. My hair is curly and I can run my fingers through it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Can't Tell
Review: I've used a few CD products before, not much, but a few. I am looking to get to know the product better as it has been recommended to me by many people. I've used it twice on my granddaughter's hair and so far I cannot see any real difference from other shampoos that I have used. I do like the fact that it is sulfate free. My granddaughter's hair is extremely dry and this is supposed to help with dryness. I will use this in conjunction with other CD products in hopes to achieve the desired result.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I did not find this hair mask to be any more nourishing than standard conditioner. The dry ends of my hair weren’t helped much at all. It did not leave my hair overly greasy. But it also didn’t perform as well as I expect from a treatment mask.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Very thick
Review: It's very thick. Does not provide moveable moisture. Very tacky and sticky like glue. Won't be purchasing again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Perfect for new mexican high desert!
Review: Listen I love in the desert, I have 3C curls that go to 4C in places. So not only is it really dry but also I have to conserve water like crazy. This MELTS tangles and it smells so good, you will not believe how many compliments I get on my hair even on day 3. Like it's so moisturizing and makes me hair feel like the finest silk like babe get this just to try it

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Feel instant softness .. Great product
Review: My hair has been so soft after using this.. Wish I had sooner..

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This hair conditioner made my long hair softer and silkier.  The ends were dry before using this but it took only one application to really freshen up and moisturize my hair.  This is my first time to try Carols Daughter and I hope to soon try more.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Like others, I really like the whole Carol's Daughter line.  Makes my hair look, and feel great.  I love that its sulphate free, and as someone who is sensitive fragrance, I love how this conditioner smells.  Its a winner all the way around.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: For dry hair issues only!
Review: Definitely will moisturize your hair!  If you aren’t already skipping days in between shampoos, you will once you start using this shampoo.  Very light fragrance.  Lathers up nicely.  For someone who doesn’t have dry hair, I would not recommend.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: I was disappointed. Made my hair hard
Review: I made a mistake and bought 2 of these. I have to dilute it with leave in conditioner cuz it makes my hair hard. I’m not happy with it and it wasn’t cheap

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I am not picky about my shampoos. I do like coconut in my hair products, since I think both the scent and effect are good. This particular shampoo pumps out very little at a time, but it foams nicely, so that might actually be a feature.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is a great product, especially if you have dry and/or color treated hair. My wife has both and absolutely swears by it.  I wouldn't recommend it if you have oily hair. My son tried it and his head almost looked like he used pomade. But for everyone else this is a top line, quality product. My wife and daughter give it five stars, I give it four and my son's opinion doesn't count.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This conditioner went on nicely and left my hair feeling soft and silky.  It does not have a lingering aroma.  I have hip-length blonde hair, very fine textured, and it does seem to have moisturized the ends, which can look very dry.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have been so happy with this brand as far as hair products go. This made my hair feel so soft and I didn't have to condition it for 2 washes. Did it make my hair feel stronger? No. I like the smell and the feel of my hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Soft hair
Review: Hair is very soft after using this product  :)

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: this conditioner is moistening and has a nice scent.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Bought randomly, so happy I did ! Love it !!
Review: Wow ! I rarely write reviews but after getting out of the shower I fell in love with this set. I got it for cheap at Ulta and was like why not- best decision. If you like cocoa nut smells then you will LOVE this! Not much is needed to make it bubbly so a lil pump is enough ! Can’t wait to buy more !

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Good product!!
Review: I have a mixture of 4B/4C and I’ve just gone natural and by hair this is the only product that has truly moisturized my hair and clumped my curls. I love the scent as well and the texture is thick but very spreadable. I would recommend.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Sun, Sand, Salt
Review: Sun, sand, and salt makes my hair a mess in the summer as I enjoy my favorite activity - being at the beach.But once again Carol's Daughter shampoo comes to the rescue.This shampoo put life and bounce into my hair after a beach vacation after just a couple of shampoos.It lathers well and smells so good.A wonderful addition to the Carol's Daughter product line.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Item as described and fast shipping
Review: Item as described and fast shipping

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Amazing !
Review: My absolute favorite lotion! So good and applies so smoothly , you can’t even tell it’s there. I use this everyday and it’s perfect.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Great for adding moisture and setting twist outs
Review: Liked the value and the scent. You don't need a lot -little goes a long way. When issued with a leave in conditioner

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Does not moisturize
Review: Does not work. Sits on top of hair . Hair ended up rough.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: I recommend.
Review: Love it. Cheaper than in store.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Spouse Pleaser
Review: My wife is a coconut lover so when ever I see anything that contains coconut I get it for her. She has used this cream and is pleased.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Good stuff!
Review: I love this! It's the best I've found.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Hello
Review: Excuse me is this cream or gel? if it’s cream how long I can leave it on my hair without rains water?

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Not a good brand for 4B  hair
Review: When you search for products for 4B hairstyles this product shows up. I was super excited  to use this after washing my hair. But for my hair type its heavy, makes my hair feel matted, hard to comb through.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Softness, nice smell
Review: First time trying this product. Over the past five months I've been looking for a product to help with my dry hair. I must save I've finally found my match. The scent is amazing and long lasting. Thanks Lisa for such an amazing product!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Seals in moisture
Review: I found this at my local TJ Maxx and OMG. It took some play to find the right way to apply for my hair, but this stuff lasts a longgggg time, keeps my curls sealed with moisture and defines them amazingly.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Soft
Review: Smells great makes hair soft

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is super creamy and conditioning. Can't go wrong trying this one out.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: It flakes to much
Review: It flakes bad. But really moisturizing

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Make the hair soft and easy to comp
Review: Ooh my God this is something to have. Have being struggling with my kids hair but this solve the problem

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Fraudulent product
Review: Fake product, not the real contents inside. I buy this product from Sally’s all the time so I know what it should smell and look like.,.this stuff is fraudulent. DONT BUY

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: It’s ok!
Review: It was ok until it dried and it was really flaky

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: I LOVE IT
Review: This Shampoo is great, my hair is so soft and easy to manage.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Love it!
Review: Love the smell. Love the smooth texture and its not heavy in my hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: FINALLY A PRODUCT THAT WORKS FOR 4C HAIR
Review: At first I thought this would be another hair fail. I have 4C hair, and there are so many products that promise to be compatible that aren't, all they do is dry you hair out, and sit on top of it making it gritty and harder to manage. I have low porosity hair, and most products just don't work for me. I typically use this cream first, then add about a tablespoon of the Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Scalp Oil and Hair Oil Deep Treatment with Castor Oil, 7 Oil Blend and Black Seed Oil, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Hair Oil for Natural Hair, massage it in, and my hair is soft, and clearly moisturized.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Not good for 4c hair!
Review: I purchased this product along with the curl enhancing moisture cream for my daughter who has 4c hair. It did not work for her hair at all see pics(last two) however for my hair it did great! I have 4a/4b hair. It defined my curls perfectly! The moisture was disappointing especially since this product is supposed to be for very dry hair; It was just ok. Overall I will not be purchasing it again for my daughter but MAY buy it for myself. If you have 4c hair save your money!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: I get so many compliments on my hair
Review: So far I am please with this conditioner and the shampoo.  I have tried so many different products since I've gone natural about 8 yrs ago. I do not have natural curls,  therefore I need to moisturized my hair to bring the curls out. I've consistently been using this and I'm please. I use a different brand after shampoo and conditioner called leave in or rinse out conditioner by Shea Martin.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Good cream for 4C hair
Review: This cream smells good & it don't weigh your hair down, makes it feel really soft. I have 4C coarse hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Carol's daughter coil enhancing moisture butter
Review: This product was the first to really shows my curl pattern like no other.  I love it.  It moisturizes while defining my curls and leaving my natural hair soft.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Naturally Lovely in all the right places.
Review: I love this stuff it smells great and is not greasy, makes my hair incredibly soft, I still need to use a pomade or setting creme to hold the locks from frazzling but its truly lovely stuff. Makes my scalp feel nourished as well.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: LOVE!
Review: I was tired of shelling out money for products that didn't follow through on what they promised and, ultimately, harmed my hair with harsh chemicals. This product has been AMAZING! Leaved my hair feeling soft, but the strands themselves feel thicker, stronger and healthier! Highly recommend.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Working great
Review: Ideally I was hoping to find a fully vegan shampoo for curly hair but since I've had a good experience with the Carol's daughter hair honey I thought I'd give this a shot and it does seem to give my hair some needed moisturization and others have said my hair looks more voluptuous so guess it's a keeper.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Product sucks
Review: I bought this because I'm always hearing what great products are from Carol's Daughter. I didn't use a lot of product but it made my hair hard. This product sucks!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: One of the best shampoo my natural 4c curled hair experience
Review: It wash so good, just with a little amont it lathers my "on the middle of the back" hair. Awesome smell. After rinse the hair feels soft and not compressed. It moistures fine. I definetly buy again and again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Good product but a little goes a long way
Review: I like how defined my 3A curls are but used too much so my curls are crunchy and feel cakey. I’ll definitely use less next time around but I think overall it’s a great product just don’t use too much!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: It is great, love it.
Review: It does not leave your hair white after it’s dry like other cream would do, it worked great for me. This was my first time buying and I’ll keep getting it it’s just so good.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Felt good when applying but after it dried my hair was not moisturized at all
Review: Really disappointed in this product. The shampoo felt good on applying but once rinse out left my hair dry. The curling creme when dried left my hair feeling stiff with this film over it but it did not feel moisturized. I have 4c hair and I won't recommend this

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Incredibly strong scent
Review: I really wanted to like this product. It has good slip and helps smooth my hair, but the scent is so strong that I can’t stand to use it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: My name is Carol
Review: Sent as a gift to my Daughter. My name is Carol. Lol. She was pleasantly surprised and loved the product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Quenches your thirsty hair
Review: I used this on my adult daughter's hair. This deep conditioner smells great and provides so much moisture to the hair.  This is a perfect collection to my daughter's healthy hair journey.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Great product for my 4C hair....
Review: I have been searching for a moisturizer that really works for 3 years, at last I have found it! It leaves my hair curly and soft, and the scent is clean!.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Nice but ...
Review: too heavy on my hair. I ended up giving it to my niece because it was too thick on my hair and I didn't use a ton but it made my hair feel super greasy and heavy. I didn't like it but my niece did. She loves it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Great for curly hair!
Review: This product is great for my dry hair. It’s heavy enough to keep frizz at bay, but it does not weight my hair down in the process. It is unlike any “cream gel” I’ve ever used before. Love the consistency! The product lasts quite a while. Great price for how long it lasts.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Spent 30 years looking for this
Review: I’ve literally been looking years for something like this for my very curly 3b/c frizz prone hair.  Most cremes are not strong enough to hold the curl and gels are too stiff and flaky and drying. This is perfect. I agree with other reviews that the scent is a bit strong and smells like mens cologne but I don’t hate it and it fades over time. I put it on damp hair in 4-5 sections and twist each section and then wrap around my finger and then shake my hair out. I usually wash my hair every other day and to reactivate I spray my hair down a bit and reapply some of the product. I understand that everyone’s hair is different and what may work for me may not for you but I’d definitely give this a try!

Title: Smells and works great! Great value.
Review: I just received this today and I'm already in love! I'm a single mom trying to save money which means less frequent hair coloring. My grey or white hair, rather... Is very course compared to the rest. I wanted something to tame them and help that hair look just as healthy as the rest... This worked immediately! A little goes far and the scent... my goodness! Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Not for Texas Heat
Review: If you're looking for all day hold in this summer heat, then this is not the product for you. It smells great and initially gives great hold, but it breaks down quickly in the summer heat and turns into an oily mess. I only advise using this product if you will be inside in the A/C all day. After less than 5 minutes outside in the sun, and my edges reverted and my forehead was a greasy mess.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: but the product was great! Don't leave the top off
Review: Price was way more expensive here than the store, but the product was great! Don't leave the top off, it destroys the product.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: The scent is amazing
Review: This isn't a great edge control, it's just not strong or lasting. But I am absolutely in love with the scent. I've always been a sucker for vanilla, but this is the best it's ever smelled. What is it? I think it has coconutty undertones, which another turn on. I see they have many other products, like shampoo and conditioner, with this scent and I wouldn't buy this edge control again, but I'd try other products just for the scent.The scent saves you. I use it just for that. I'd probably mix it with a better working edge control just for that, as well. It's addictive. It does work a little and it makes my hair soft, but there are plenty of flyaway. I was impressed by the size, however. You get what you pay for!

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Avoid--completely useless
Review: Horrible. This product is greasy and caused mild breakouts on my forehead and temples. It also did nothing to hold down my edges. I had to mix in some eco style gel just to get some hold, but even then, it would start to lift within an hour. It also left a residue so my edges would be lifted, filmy AND stiff. This product rivals ORS for the worst edge control ever. I'm having much better results with TGIN now.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Wanted it to work, but not holding my edges down
Review: I really wanted this to work, but unfortunately this product did absolutely nothing for my edges after I put it on. I did a few test runs of putting a silk scarf on and leaving it on for awhile, but about 1-2 hours later (if that) my defined edges were no where to be found. Today alone I’ve reapplied it 3 times. Even if reappying the product is required 3+ times is too much for me.Fortunately I am working from home so I am able to go through these trial and errors, but I can’t allow myself to keep using this and expect it to get better.If it works for you, great; however, it does not work for all and that’s okay - just have to try something else.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Nice option
Review: It's my current edge control.  I've purchased it from Amazon several times.  While I'm always interested in trying different edge controls, I  have consistently I've been pleased with this.  It doesn't slick down my edges in a sticky, tight way. But it lays them down nicely and adds to my look. I'm considering adding another type of edge control to lightly apply on top, just to get a longer lasting hold for long days. But this is a great option if you're desirous of having nice edges and keeping them.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great product NO FLAKE
Review: Great product. I have extremely thick hair and this works well. Edges stayed down for 3 days straight with no touch up. Love the fact that it does NOT flake.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Half of the product is missing
Review: At first I thought if it was turnt on its side In shipping it would cause this.  But its impossible because the consistency of the product wouldn't allow for that to happen. Also the empty side is dry, no residue from the product evee being there .So annoying, it's like everyone are cutting corners these days.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: For Braiding
Review: I plan to use this for braiding, and I can say that it does work for that. However, I noticed that if I took too long or if I touched it too many times, my hair would curl (I'm natural) back up, or form a looser curl that it's original, rather than stay in place. I can't say that it will lay my edges down, because I haven't tried and don't do those types of things to my hair. But I feel that it honestly could if I were to quickly do it and not touch it. Also, like most products like this, you may need to press something firm against your head until it dries.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Good product, I buy again and again
Review: This is my fave edge control/ hair hold gel. It’s thick so use a small 2 finger scoop and spread thin. I mix with firm gel or another thick edge control to maximize hold and it’s good even on its own if u have coarse hair. Definitely worth money to me

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: It's not what I expected
Review: Most of the products of this line smell great, so I may have been expecting the same from this edge control. It smells faintly like the cream of nature edge control. Which isn't bad, just not what I anticipated.Also It's hold is not good at all. I tested a bit of it on my edges and they didn't stay down for more than 5 mins. I have very soft, 2c hair, and usually use edge control just to handle the frizz my baby hairs have and nothing, I could move it with my finger gently touching it. It didn't set or control my hair at all, so I don't expect it'll work for other hair textures that are curlier than mine.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: No longer happy with product.
Review: Had this item on auto delivery every two months, after multiple deliveries I noticed a change in the gel color. The darker in color the gel the less effective the hold. Now I have several containers that I cannot return, but they do not hold my edges in place. Looking for a new product.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Strong Scent
Review: I just received this product today and immediately tried to use it. The scent is strong. It’s a nice scent but very loud. I don’t mind lightly scented products but this one is to much for me, I couldn’t take it. Not even sure if this will hold because I never made it that far. Gave 3 stars because you have to pick one (wish I could leave it blank) so I choose 3 bc the feel makes me believe this might hold but I’ll never no for sure

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Edges out of control
Review: When I put it on my edges in the morning before going to work, my edges look smooth.  I feel good.  Then I get into the car to go to work, I look in the rear view mirror to see my edges curled right back up!  By the end of the day the product is dried up. I have 4c\d hair. It’s dry.I like the smell. It provides a nice protective barrier for head bands or anything that puts stress or rest on your hairline. However, I didn’t get that smooth edge control. I’m yet to find a product that works for me. I may order this again to help protect my hairline, but not for the edge control.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Good product, but not right for me
Review: This product is high quality, but it’s not right for my hair type or needs.Pros: new and unopened, pleasant light neutral vanilla fragrance, concentrated, non-greasyCons: for my needs, it’s too thick and heavy,  but would work for many other types and styles Carol’s Daughter is a good company and I’ll continue trying their other products. If they’d go back to the original hair milk scent, I’d be thrilled.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Will buy again
Review: This smells so good! It is very thick, like very stiffened jello. But when you rub it between your fingers it softens up. At first you think your hair will look very greasy, but as it is absorbed you will not notice it anymore (of course depending on how much you use) and it really softens up the hair and gives it this nice smell as a bonus. Good product, will buy again when this is finished.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Good product, smells good, feels good...
Review: So I use this to braid up my daughter's hair as well as the edges and it works like a charm. Silky smooth and just really helpful to my braiding of her hair. I really like that it keeps it's luster through out the day so when I go to pick up my daughter from school, outside of normal wear from her running around, it still looks good and we could go somewhere else if we needed to without having to retouch up her hair. I like that aspect.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Typical edge control
Review: I found these to be the same as other brands of edge control. I have fine textured wavy hair and so I only need a little bit. The scent is strong. My husband has thick course wavy/curly hair and it worked well for his braids also. If you have finer hair I wouldn’t use it regularly as it seems to be rough for regular use. For both of our hair types though it stayed thick until washed out even with light application.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great edge moisturizer, not a replacement for gel, but used as a base.
Review: This is a great edge moisturizer, but not so good for an all day hold. What I like to do is use it as a base to smooth my edges and lay them down, then I use a very very small amount of hair gel to keep it in place all day long. Since I’m not using only gel, my edges don’t dry out and break off. Instead, they stay moisturized all day long while that dab of hair gel keeps it locked in.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Buy from a reputable retailer.
Review: First off, it came half empty, so beware of buying product on Amazon. Smells good, but i don't have high hopes for it's performance. My daughter is mixed and this product feels too thin or watered down for her hair type. I tried it this evening to see if it's worth receiving half empty, and it's definitely not. Im going to return it.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Light hold
Review: This product provides a light hold to hair edges for my fly away strands for 10-12 hours. The product is not sticky nor does it make the hair stiff. The scent of this product is very subtle. The smell is not heavy and people will not be smelling your hair when you enter the room and that I do like about the product. I would not recommend this if you are looking for a heavy hold or your hair is very thick.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Not for me
Review: This did not do anything for keeping even 1 small hair down. I have a few short hairs in front but this could not even handle those. I guess its just not for my hair type but I hope it works for other but I personally wont buy it again.P.S a bit expensive for the amount you get.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: I BOUGHT A 2 PACK!!
Review: I can’t use many gels on my hair and scalp sometimes because of the alcohol made in it. But I can say by far using this brand in general has not flakes up my scalp, now trying the edge control, it has a hold just like any other and it doesn’t give my scalp a run for it’s dryness. I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND to someone who is looking for a edge control (with little to none alcohol content) to buy and try. If u don’t want the regular size also try finding samples or even the travel size

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Buy again..
Review: Try it as soon as it got here! Keeps your edges smooth so definetly moisturize! And it kind of smells like vanilla and Castor oil. But I love it!

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Does not hold
Review: I'm not one to typically leave reviews but this is just a PSA for anyone who is looking for that extreme hold for your edges - This isn't it. This product smells good and has a waxy texture that lays the hair down pretty well but only for a couple of minutes. By the time I get to the office my edges are curling up and not laid whatsoever. I just got my braids done for the first time so I didn't really know what product would be best and I sprung for this one because it was inexpensive and looked like it used natural ingredients, which is still true, but if you want your edges to stay put, definitely look elsewhere.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Pretty good!
Review: It was only four dollars,  I am so surprised it worked being this cheap because my hair is really kinky around the edges. It slicked my hair down without being white, gummy, or streaky. I hadn't been able to buy my normal Vonte styling gel (which I highly recommend) so I bought this and I am happy with the results. It is initially crunchy for me, but it turns soft about five minutes later.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Doesn’t Work- Not Even On Super Fine Baby Hairs
Review: Smells great but does absolutely NOTHING to keep baby hairs in place. I have fine hair, so the fact that this doesn’t work even on my easily-tamed hair says a lot. I wish I’d read the reviews instead of picking this because it was “rated” high. Don’t waste your money- buy a product that actually works.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Not a real edge control product.
Review: YES!!  Black owned company, expected more?!  Dnt make C4 hair edges lay down. Does not hold.  Doesn't stiffen or harden.  Its like thick sweet scented hair grease.  It irritated the skin on my hair line, scabs developed, after a few days.  For me a possible allergic reaction?  If you want an edge controller this is not for you.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Disappointed
Review: I was so excited to receive this product; however, it did absolutely nothing for my edges. I have locs that are mid back length. I wrap my hair alot and I thought that this product would lay my edges in a way to wear my wrap with big hoop earrings. Upon its initial application on my edges, it smoothed and laid them, but an hour later my edges unraveled and curled up. I brushed my edges under my wrap and moved on. I won't be purchasing again. My hair is 4B.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Did not work as expected.
Review: Smells nice. Appears light when applying but less than an hour after application the styling was gone and there was just a oily residue as evidence the product was ever used. I have 4c hair and this, like many others, did nothing for styling my edges

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Held down edges
Review: I love Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla products. I was excited to find out about the edge control smoother. It works well, holding down my edges. It doesn’t dry out my hair and it doesn’t leave a build up.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: lesson learned
Review: this product  was ok for the time that I needed it for, it doesn't have the holding longevity for my hair as promised. And it was sent half filled in the container , I only kept it because I needed something for my hair at the time,but I will never order this product online again

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: I Would Not Buy This Again
Review: When applied to my edges, it left a white residue that looked like gray hair. Not the effect I was looking for. I Love some of Carol's Daughter's products except the edge control. I feel it needs to be worked on to be better.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Fragrance is strong
Review: Opening the jar and it hits you and it's not a good mixture of chemicals/fragrance. Just turned my stomach. Had to end of giving it away and it didn't really work for them b/c it doesn't do well in humidity.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Doesn’t Work for me.
Review: I do not like it. It doesn’t work my 3B to 3C curl type hair. My hair is naturally curly and so is my daughter’s. It’s more greasy and more of a moisturizer than anything else. It doesn’t even last an hour for us.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great product
Review: Love the scent, texture & does a great job holding my baby hairs in place. When i wear my hair up at work, i use this to keep them in place. Dries nicely. Rinses out easily. Perfect!

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Just No!
Review: This is very dry and stiff, and I did not like it for smoothing my edges (relaxed hair).  Also, because of its consistency, and I used it VERY sparingly, I was forced to brush it through, as opposed to finger smoothing with other product.For me, it's a no.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Amazing product ! 10/10
Review: I love the smell of the black vanilla !!It’s not as hard as gel which is what I was looking for so I love it ! Gentle for my daughter so it’s a win win !It does hold really good !If you aren’t good at doing edges and want to learn this is where to start !

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Irritated my daughter's skin
Review: I have used hundreds of different products on my daughter's hair and have never had an issue until I used this. 98% of those products were used in her hair and not this close to her skin. This instantly caused the skin around her forehead to turn red and gave her bumps.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Not what I thought
Review: This product isn’t sticky and I love that about it but the hold isn’t as I thought it was. It smell amazing and is manageable when applying and working to style hair

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: It holds
Review: This product smells good. This product has hold. I'm sure that if I would have used a brush or comb that you would have been able to see the slickness a little better. But I had just used my finger just to see what would happen. And I was satisfied with the results.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Moisturizing but not a lot of hold.
Review: Moisturizing but not a lot of hold. Smell,  texture, and cost were great. I was expecting more hold but may work  better for fine or processed hair.  I need more hold for my edge curls.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Did not work
Review: The product smells good.  Unfortunately, it did not work.  Once you smooth down your edges, it appears that this product is doing the job.  However, once you start moving around and it becomes dry, the hair edges start to revert back.  I had to reapply water to my hair several times throughout the day just to make my edges lay down.  I'd rather just use gel.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Best Edge Control Ever!!!
Review: This product works very well. It's very gentle on the hair and washes out easily. You do have to use a little more than most of the other brands because it is so gentle. However, it is worth it, it moisturizes and the cost is good. You can easily comb through this one as well. It may occasionally flake, if so, just rub the area with a little water to even it out.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Save your money.
Review: The product doesn’t do as well as I thought it would. It often leaves white residue behind and doesn’t hold edges down. I definitely will not be purchasing this again.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Small and does not last it evaporates
Review: This product does not last long on your edges if anything it evaporates and does not hold my edges down. It definitely smells good but the product itself is small and does not last.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Hated it!
Review: Definitely would not purchase this edge control again. It did not lay my edges down like it stated and I have really good hair. Instead, it made my hair really oily. Mad I waisted my money and because I opened it, I can't return it.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Not for my 3c curly hair
Review: I loved the smell. If you add water it gets really slippery. It makes my curly hair straight though. Weighs it down a lot like any other pomade. I have 3c curls. Likely won’t be using it anymore as it destroys my curls. I guess it’s better for straight hair?

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Good Edge control
Review: I started using the product right out the amazon shipping box. I'm pleased with it. Not to oily.Its holds on baby hair for wigs to your own natural baby hairs.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Love it. I’ve been using it for years
Review: I actually have been using this product for years. You just have to be careful not to use too much or it looks too shiny. I apply a small amount and if needed a little bit more. Start with less then add more. My edges look natural

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: I wouldn’t recommend this
Review: It wasn’t a strong hold for my hair and my hair kinky at all. It also isn’t good for hair growth. I recommend swag goo edge glue because it’s a super strong hold and it helps edges grow

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: A new favorite of mine
Review: A new favorite of mine. No flakes...glides on smoothly. Smells great (not loud because I have allergies). Just hope it is offered in a larger size one day.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Thick Coily Hair BEWARE!!!! (Type 4 Hair and edges)
Review: I have type 4 hair and this didn't hold my hair for 1 minute. Edge booster works better for me and holds my edges all day. The scent is like an artificial cinnamon bun filling and is extremely moisturizing so that was the only upside.it would probably work in looser edges or thinner less oily edges.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Smells Great… Light Hold
Review: Doesn’t really hold my hair in place.  At least not for long.  Better than nothing but can’t get through the whole day with the desired style.  I will say my daughter uses this and loves it.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Do not buy for edge control
Review: The scent and moisturizer was decent, but I bought it for edge control. This product doesn't control or smooth anything. I'm using it for the scent and moisturizer only.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Scent is great.
Review: First of all, I received a half of a product. The scent is great.  But I felt cheated so I did not use it as yet to give a full and honest review.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Smells good but does not last
Review: This product smells nice but only keeps my daughter's edges down for 30 minutes tops. My daughter has 3C curls.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: LESS than Average
Review: The formula is Very hard in container, doesn’t build on brush well or apply easily on edges. It takes some time to style edges bc of density in formula, especially if you are trying to lay/style them. It doesn’t hold as well as my other edge gels, I think it lasted well for a couple hours, which was disappointing. The product also leaves a film/white residue after there is any movement in the edges, which bc it didn’t last long, was a bummer. The only reason why I am giving this product 2 stars is bc the price is not bad (although it didn’t work well) and bc it did hold for a couple hours.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: I like this.
Review: This edge control glides on beautiful but if it’s warm or you start to get hot these babies sweating right off. Too soft for me. I do love the smell though! Maybe good for scalp braid!

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great product. Poor packaging
Review: Great product.Awful packaging.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: The best edge control ever!!
Review: I’ve tried several edge control gels and THIS IS THE BEST! I have locs and when I don’t want to retwist, I smooth this in the front and back of my hair, along with essential oil infused water, then put a silk scarf on for 20 minutes, and my 4c hair is LAID! Not crunchy, not dry, and no residue! I’m ordering more right now!

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Hold...what hold?
Review: The value for your money is great, and Carols Daughter has a wonderful scents for all of their products; however welllll...I have a natural hair and this gel doesn’t slay my edges nice and slick as I would like. My curls are more defined with this gel, but that’s not the look I want to attain. Gotta try something else.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: I have no complaints so far and it smells good. If it helps anyone I have 4B hair ...
Review: I have tried a lot of edge controls and they have my edges for a god 5 min, but this edge control so far is doing its job. I have no complaints so far and it smells good. If it helps anyone I have 4B hair and it is very stubborn and curly.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Not for my hair type I guess
Review: Bought it for my daughter and I. We have 2 different (natural hair)types,mines more so fine and VERY curly. Didn't keep didn't keep down my edges at all! For hers, it kept it down a bit, but a hour later it was no sign of edge control 😥 (both on clean,non heavy product hair)

Title: Favorite Gel🖤
Review: This is my favorite gel to use for my braids...I'm sure its great for edges as well. The smell is absolutley Delicious; it keeps them soft and intact without being hard or sticky.✌🖤

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Glad I gave it a shot
Review: I have the truest of them all..4c hair and it laid my edges so tough I got scared.  .I was legit scared. I used too much on first application and went to brush my edges and it was STIFF, after one brush.Warning it does flake or give that white residue, but that might have been my leave-in conditioner. When I used it again without conditioner,  no flaking.

Title: Great smell terrible hold
Review: It smells amazing but darling the hold is completely not it I’ll lay my edges before I leave by the time i get down stairs my edges are gone it’s horrible seriously I have very fine hair and most products hold enough I do sweat near my edges majority of the time but it still doesn’t hold anything down I ended up just throwing it away

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: It actually works, but didn't quite work for *me*
Review: I'm a dude with different textured hair, some is straight, some is wavy, but it constantly feels dry like straw.  I've tried many leave in conditioners that work for about 1-2 hours, after that my hair goes back to it's prior state.  This stuff by carol's daughter actually works...  It smooths out your hair and keeps it from frizzing or poofing, it really does.. and it worked all day.  So it gets 4 stars.  I deduct 1 star simply because it was sort of sticky feeling, almost like a pomade.. but not quite.  My hair wasn't able to "flow" and move with this, it seemed to hold it in place.. This was so close to being a perfect product for me, I just wish it didn't seem to kind of "glue" my hair.  But so far, it's the only thing I've tried that actually kept it looking conditioned and lush.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Greasy & Does Not Work
Review: It smells nice, nice consistency, nice idea. But it simply does not work. My hairdresser really likes it, and she puts it on my edges after she braids my hair. Literally, by the time I walk out of the door (5 minutes later), my edges are already lifted, and this gel has turned into a sticky grease. Just to make sure, I purchased this at the store, and I have confirmed it does not work for me. I have very kinky African hair, and when I use this product, it slicks my edges down for about 5 minutes, before turning into sticky white grease, and having my edges lift and coil back up. I would not recommend this product.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Like sticky vaseline.
Review: I am currently in the market for a good edge control/gel to keep me from sweating out my hairline in this ridiculous 90 degree heat.I decided to give this a try since it claimed to be a drier formula that wouldn't flake or dry my hair out. When I initially put it on my hair it was tacky and seemed to be doing the trick. I put my scarf on to set it, but 15 mins later when I took it off it was as if I'd never put anything there. My hairline was kind of greasy and shiny (I assume it was due to the beeswax) and my hair had already curled back up.Usually I have pretty good luck with Carol's Daughter products, but I should've known this wouldn't work when it claimed to be moisturizing.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Battle of the Edges...
Review: Allow me to start by saying I'm Sicilian. My hair has always been wild & my edges have always been a HUGE pain to manage. After trying many methods to control / lay my edges I was about to give up until I bought (of all things) the leave-in conditioner. It's a freakin' miracle. My hair is soft has shine & best of all my edges are finally manageable. Good-bye electrocuted sheep hair!

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Very disappointed, product had melted and was liquid.
Review: I have always used this edger for my hair.  This time I was disappointed.  When I opened it, product spilled out of the container like honey, lost more than half the product.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Not even a 5 minute hold
Review: This doesn't hold. I use on my new growth; my natural hair is soft. It holds while I"m applying, I brush and put on a head scarf to make sure hair stays down. Seconds after scarf is removed, the hair curls back and look sweaty like I just had a workout. Waste of money! Oh it does smell great!

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: works wonderfully without residue
Review: This works great for me!  I read the other reviews and that hasn't been my experience at all.  I have moderately wavy hair, with parts that fall loose and start curling or sticking straight up like crazy, especially if I didn't begin the day with wet hair (i.e. if I washed it the day before).  I've never been able to figure out how to tame those flyaways and stick-ups, until I tried this product!  At the end of the day, the hair around my cowlicks and crowns is NOT sticking up!  It's amazing.  I think that's what this product is intended for -- not removing overall frizz (really need good conditioner for that!) but for "edge control"  -- the little bits of your hairstyle that just won't go the right way, or stay the right way, the hairs that have a mind of their own.  This works awesomely for that.I've used it for three or four days in a row and my hair still doesn't look greasy where I'm using it.  It looks a lot like petroleum jelly (mostly clear) and has the consistency of lip balm, or possibly just a tad softer.It's also worth pointing out that while it's fairly expensive, the amount needed is microscopic--so microscopic that it's hard to even get out as little as needed--and I expect that this little tub will last for months and months, even on my waist-length thick hair.FINALLY my hair looks just as neat on the days I don't wash it as it does on the days when I do!  Love this stuff.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Where have you been all of my life???? =)
Review: I have seen many commercials and adds for this product and bought it to see if it lived up to the hype.. and....IT DOES. I tried it and just with less than a pea drop I laid it on my edges and instantly my edges lay down...without having to comb or brush them! All I can say is wow! Where have you been all of my life? Love it =)

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Edge Control Smoother For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Honey, Clear Edge Smoother, Edge Tamer, 2 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Lay those edges!
Review: My favorite edge control. Great price!
