Review: I did not find this hair mask to be any more nourishing than standard conditioner. The dry ends of my hair weren’t helped much at all. It did not leave my hair overly greasy. But it also didn’t perform as well as I expect from a treatment mask.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Shaping Cream Gel, with Coconut Oil, Coconut Milk, Silicone Free, Paraben Free Hair Gel for Curly Hair , Mineral Oil Free, for Very Dry Hair, 16 Oz

This MELTS tangles and it smells so good, you will not believe how many compliments I get on my hair even on day 3. Like it's so moisturizing and makes me hair feel like the finest silk like babe get this just to try it

Title: Feel instant softness .. Great product

Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This hair conditioner made my long hair softer and silkier.  The ends were dry before using this but it took only one application to really freshen up and moisturize my hair.  This is my first time to try Carols Daughter and I hope to soon try more.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Shaping Cream Gel, with Coconut Oil, Coconut Milk, Silicone Free, Paraben Free Hair Gel for Curly Hair , Mineral Oil Free, for Very Dry Hair, 16 Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Shaping Cream Gel, with Coconut Oil, Coconut Milk, Silicone Free, Paraben Free Hair Gel for Curly Hair , Mineral Oil Free, for Very Dry Hair, 16 Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I am not picky about my shampoos. I do like coconut in my hair products, since I think both the scent and effect are good. This particular shampoo pumps out very little at a time, but it foams nicely, so that might actually be a feature.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Shaping Cream Gel, with Coconut Oil, Coconut Milk, Silicone Free, Paraben Free Hair Gel for Curly Hair , Mineral Oil Free, for Very Dry Hair, 16 Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is a great product, especially if you have dry and/or color treated hair. My wife has both and absolutely swears by it.  I wouldn't recommend it if you have oily hair. My son tried it and his head almost looked like he used pomade. But for everyone else this is a top line, quality product. My wife and daughter give it five stars, I give it four and my son's opinion doesn't count.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Shaping Cream Gel, with Coconut Oil, Coconut Milk, Silicone Free, Paraben Free Hair Gel for Curly Hair , Mineral Oil Free, for Very Dry Hair, 16 Oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This conditioner went on nicely and left my hair feeling soft and silky.  It does not have a lingering aroma.  I have hip-length blonde hair, very fine textured, and it does seem to have moisturized the ends, which can look very dry.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Shaping Cream Gel, with Coconut Oil, Coconut Milk, Silicone Free, Paraben Free Hair Gel for Curly Hair , Mineral Oil Free, for Very Dry Hair, 16 Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have been so happy with this brand as far as hair products go. This made my hair feel so soft and I didn't have to condition it for 2 washes. Did it make my hair feel stronger? No. I like the smell and the feel of my hair.

Title: FINALLY A PRODUCT THAT WORKS FOR 4C HAIR

I have low porosity hair, and most products just don't work for me. I typically use this cream first, then add about a tablespoon of the Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Scalp Oil and Hair Oil Deep Treatment with Castor Oil, 7 Oil Blend and Black Seed Oil, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Hair Oil for Natural Hair, massage it in, and my hair is soft, and clearly moisturized.

Overall I will not be purchasing it again for my daughter but MAY buy it for myself. If you have 4c hair save your money!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Shaping Cream Gel, with Coconut Oil, Coconut Milk, Silicone Free, Paraben Free Hair Gel for Curly Hair , Mineral Oil Free, for Very Dry Hair, 16 Oz
Title: Spent 30 years looking for this
Review: I’ve literally been looking years for something like this for my very curly 3b/c frizz prone hair.  Most cremes are not strong enough to hold the curl and gels are too stiff and flaky and drying. This is perfect. I agree with other reviews that the scent is a bit strong and smells like mens cologne but I don’t hate it and it fades over time. I put it on damp hair in 4-5 sections and twist each section and then wrap around my finger and then shake my hair out. I usually wash my hair every other day and to reactivate I spray my hair down a bit and reapply some of the product. I understand that everyone’s hair is different and what may work for me may not for you but I’d definitely give this a try!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Shaping Cream Gel, with Coconut Oil, Coconut Milk, Silicone Free, Paraben Free Hair Gel for Curly Hair , Mineral Oil Free, for Very Dry Hair, 16 Oz
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: Retread my frizzy hair!! This and the Monoi Carol’s Daughter masks are really good. Don’t get the almond one though. It’s thick, and it makes your hair silky! If you have frizzy hair, you’ll still need something for your ends when your hair is dry, like Schwarzkopf for Ends.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Will not be purchasing Carol's Daughter Products any longer.
Review: I have used this product for years. They have either changed the recipe or the product I recieved had gone rancid. It was not its usual buttery color but rather a stark white. The consistency was that of the kids play slime. It did not have its usual soothing vanilla scent. It was more of a chemical vanilla. I stopped using the Black Vanilla shampoo last year for the same reason guess this product is off of my shopping list also.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: New favorite!
Review: Of all the CD products that I've bought this...thisssssss is amazing.It's almost the consistency of tapioca pudding before rubbed between palms but it spreads easily on my hair when wet or dry.And the moisture, not even Cantu or Shea moisture affects my hair like this.I wish this container was bigger.Hair type doesn't help but i'll give it just in case.Very coily 3c/4a with color damage because I bleach and color like crazy. Hard to get moisture in my strands!But with this I can wash, apply oil and then coat with CD-black vanilla and my curls are sooo soft.The search continues!

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great for boys too!
Review: I LOVE the hair smoothie. I use it weekly in my mixed sons hair. Within the first week of using it his hair was completely different. It was moisturized like it needed to be, soft, manageable, and his curls were more defined. It has also started to grow so much faster now that it is properly moisturized. The best product I’ve used so far.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Did not leave my hair soft.
Review: Tried this hair smoothie twice after purchasing in December.  It did not leave my hair feeling soft and manageable like some other reviewers stated.  I also did not notice any scent to the product.  Bottom line, it did not work for my 4c natural hair.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Holy Mother...It works
Review: I have tried so many hair masks for my super fine, non porous hair, and this works!!! I cannot believe it!! I read about this product on a blog, and sulfate free is best for my hair type. This keeps my baby fine (and bleach destroyed) hair soft and manageable. Plus, it alleviates the dry ends I have. I love this!!

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: I think they changed the formula(?), but still decent
Review: Edit- Day after, and I increased rating from 3 to 4 stars. I've decided that although the formula might have changed, it still had some positive changes on my hair. Morning after and my hair looked shinier and softer (although didn't felt thag soft, just looked). It also had a nice scent left on it. My hair is dyed (wasn't in the past), straight and fine.---I was first introduced to this product a few years back when I found it at my local TJ Maxx. After the first try, I fell in love. The smell was fantastic and I could immediately see a difference after using the product as directed in the back label. I purchased it through Amazon recently, but even the color of the product itself was different (before was more of a darker cream color and now was much closer to a white). It still smelled good but not as great as before, it was a much lighter scent. Regarding results, my hair was left smelling nice and vanilla-y but I can't tell any difference other than that, whereas before I could tell how soft my hair became from using it. Perhaps a change in formula caused this considerably different experience.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Smells very good but it didn’t leave my daughters hair feeling moisturized
Review: Smells very good but it didn’t leave my daughters hair feeling moisturized. It actually kind of felt like straw after i rinsed it out. I will use up the container since i purchased it but i will not buy again. There are way better deep conditioners for the same price point.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Good! But I still prefer Sacred Tiare
Review: Scent: I tried this because vanilla is my all-time fav scent. Unfortunately, the smell isn't as amazing as, say Warm Vanilla Sugar from Bath and Body Works. But, it's def not bad. And it's not a super strong smell, so I don't think it'll offend anyone but the most staunch vanilla-haters.Softness/Shininess: My main concern for my hair is improving luster. I figured this would be about the same or better than Sacred Tiare (my intro to Carol's Daughter products). I have 2B hair (with some 2A and 2C) that's not terribly dry, but it does get somewhat frizzy and dull randomly. Sacred Tiare was a godsend for my hair; it made my hair super shiny and super soft after 1 use. This product hasn't had quite the same magical effect, but it has made my hair shinier and softer than if I hadn't used the product. I think I would need to use a lot more of this or leave it in a lot longer (not sure... I'll try both) to get the same results as a tiny bit of Sacred Tiare.Overall: I will be keeping this jar, but I won't be buying it again. I will go back to Sacred Tiare once I finish with this.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)

Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   Per directions;Use after their shampoo and LEAVE IN conditioner... leave this hair smoothie on for 5-7 minutes and rinse out well...So why use a leave in conditioner if your gonna rinse it out using this product afterwards.Come on Carol's Daughter.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Works Effectively.
Review: I used once and notice that my hair had stopped shedding so much.  Used a second time and noticed again that the shedding had lessened more.  Looking forward to continuing to notice results.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: My Favorite Conditioner
Review: My hair can't be without this conditioner.  I use it every other time I wash my hair so I don't get build up. I hand comb to dry my straight, frizzy, damaged hair and this stuff has good slick to do that. I shampoo, leave this in for a min 10 minutes, rinse, and use argan oil afterward. I give a lot of credit to the wheat germ oil in it. I've always used conditioners with that ingredient in them.This also works for my friend who has fine, super curly hair. She doesn't like weight, so she washes it out completely. An all over wonderful product for our frizzy hair.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: The best thing ever
Review: So I don’t actually rave about anything I do give reviews usually but I must give carols daughter huge props! My hair is very course and dry and wavey and extremely frizzy and frizz prone especially in humidity and contact with water. And this hair mask is the best thing I could ever have found! I use it carols daughter leave in conditioner after I rinse the mask with COLD water I mean cold. Don’t rinse in the shower!

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Works Wonders for My Dry, Chemically Treated Hair
Review: I got a keratin treatment a month ago, and after not properly conditioning my hair since the treatment, I decided to use this! And thank goodness I did! I left it on my hair over night with a plastic cap. I rinsed it out in the morning and my hair was rejuvenated.  And best of all, it seems to not have harmed my keratin treatment.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: In Love 😍
Review: This product is so moisturizing and left my hair so soft. The smell is beautiful and relaxing. I’m truly amazed at how this product worked. My curls are define and moisturized. I highly suggest buying it because it won’t disappoint.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great for splitting ends!
Review: I bought this as a last ditch effort to counter my ever splitting ends.Since I started washing my hair daily (new job makes me sweat a lot) I noticed my ends had really suffered for it.I got this product because I am already a loyal Carol's Daughter customer by exclusively using their black vanilla line of shampoo and conditioner, so I figured this would work great towards not mixing scents.I apply it to the lower half of my hair while dry and put it in a shower cap while doing other things for around 45 minutes before showering and I found it has helped greatly!

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: It worked!
Review: Ok.  Call me impressed!  I love the scent of these black vanilla products.  I tried the travel size shampoo and leave in with no results.  I tried the hair milk.. Nothin.  I tried this smoothie expecting failure.  At last I was wrong.  Small bottle for the price.  Weird texture and I only had to use a lil.  Goes on smooth. I parted my hair in the center and each side into quarters. I put on a platic cap I kept it in overnight.  My hair was soooo soft it was unreal.  I have 4b/c low porosity natural hair.  I think if I add a heat cap the results will be even better. My hair was volumimous yet smooth.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Another fabulous product!
Review: I started by purchasing the almond shampoo and conditioner for my damaged, highlighted blonde hair. I was so impressed by how healthy and soft it made my hair so I tried my luck with the black vanilla hair mask. Omg I'm hooked! Get this stuff! My hair has never felt so soft and healthy while blonde!! For the record, my hair is very fine but super thick and my locks LOVE this stuff!

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)

Review: Love it. I had been using Shea Moisture products, however Shea Moisture products (while nice) leave build up. Doesn't matter how well you rub it in, it will always leave build up. This product you can leave in and it does not leave residue/build up. Hair is softer, growing and smells nice. Zero complaints.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great Deep Conditioner
Review: For the price, this product is very hard to beat. I've used a lot of high-end conditioners and this is on par with many of them. My hair is caucasian, thick, color treated many times over, almost halfway down my back, and in need of a trim. My ends are pretty crispy, but I hide it pretty well with all my various smoothing products. (My hair takes forever to grow and trims only seem to make the problem worse.) The consistency is creamy and thick and even on my long hair, I don't use very much so I expect this container to last a while. I don't notice any significant fading of my hair (currently light blondish reddish copper). I have been using this in conjunction with the Black Vanilla shampoo and they pair well together. Since my hair is dry, I use this as my regular conditioner (I usually wash my hair about twice a week).The scent is a warm, creamy vanilla...if you remember the original Glade vanilla scent from back in the day, this is pretty much that scent exactly. It isn't too noticeable when it dries, which I prefer when it comes to sweet smells like this in my hair.I squeeze the water out of my hair in the shower, massage this in to the lower half of my hair, and let it sit while I do all my other stuff, occasionally rubbing it in to help keep the hair from getting too cold and closing the cuticle. My hair is very silky when I rinse it out, and after drying and straightening it's very soft and healthy feeling. My ends are still slightly dry so I do use a tiny dab of a smoothing treatment on my very ends after styling as a finishing touch, but I could get away with just the hair smoothie if I needed to.For even better results, put a shower cap on after massaging this into your hair and use the hair dryer for about 5 minutes, then let sit until the hair starts to cool and then rinse out.This is a friggin' bargain for the results, and I especially appreciate that the formula is not loaded with waxes and dimethicone which just coat your hair to give the illusion that it's healthy / shiny while blocking real conditioning ingredients from being able to penetrate the hair shaft, leaving your hair in increasingly worse condition. This contains a lot of natural oils and cocoa butter that would benefit pretty much everyone of all ethnicities and hair types except those with super greasy hair. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this to others as a great deep conditioning treatment.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: My beautiful 16" silky hair quickly became a 10" mane of ...
Review: A few hours ago, I purchased this product at my local Sally's Beauty Supply store. Since last November I had been experimenting with different colors on my hair because of emotional trauma I am still currently going through. I often use my hair as a getaway.So, wanting to get away as dramatically as possible, this past March I went from my natural African-American black hair to a honey-blonde on my own. I had always done my own color jobs and they have turned out perfectly, but the bleach is what sent my hair into ruins. My beautiful 16" silky hair quickly became a 10" mane of hard, dry, split ended, frustrating hair as it broke off terribly. Everyone has asked if I cut my hair, and I just lie and reply the affirmative.Anyway, after seeing a random advertisement for Carol's Daughter on Facebook, and coincidentally clicking on a link to their webpage, I decided to try this product. Seeing as I was close to shaving my head, I knew I couldn't go wrong. After wetting my hair and applying the smoothie throughout it, then putting on a plastic cap, I let it sit in my hair for about 3 hours. I washed it out and then co-washed with my normal conditioner. I blow dried and straightened my hair, and I have to say it doesn't even feel like the hair I woke up sadly to this morning! It's actually shiny and soft and...bouncy! My hair hasn't been bouncy since March! It almost feels like my hair that I had back in November. As I continue to use this product, I will update my review in about a month or so as I use it to deep condition every week until then. I have to say, this hair smoothie may just be my hair savior in a jar!

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great as a leave-in conditioner
Review: I have normal hair but live in a very dry climate.  My hair was looking drier than normal even after conditioning.  I thought I would try this and have used it for a few days now as a leave-in conditioner and what a difference.  I use just a little, rub between my hands and apply it to towel dried hair.  It does not weigh it down.  My hair was immediately soft and shiny after just day one.  No static from the very low humidity and my hair looks and feels great.  I have not tried it as a rinse out conditioner but as a leave in it works great.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: TL;DR: Turned my bird lady hair into something presentable!
Review: I was very pleasantly surprised. I had frizzy, extremely dry hair that stayed dry at the ends no matter how much conditioner I slathered on. I occasionally would put oil on my hair to control the frizziness and static, but I don't like how my hair feels after using it (greasy, heavy, etc) so I don't use it much. I searched for what seemed like hours for the right deep conditioner (because apparently there are a million different types, and they all do different things) and I came across this and decided to just give it a go. I mean, it can't get much worse, right?When opened the package, it was sealed up and nothing was spilling out, so that's a good sign. I noticed that it definitely had a shea butter or coconut oil consistency, and I wasn't sure if this would be a good thing or a bad thing. The smell is fantastic. To me, it smells like a candle; my husband said I smelled like cookies. After my shower, I decided to just go for the kill and skip using it as regular conditioner: I put it on the ends of my damp hair and put on a shower cap and turned on my blow-dryer. I sat on my bathroom floor blow-drying for 10 minutes, and after the 10 minutes was up, I rinsed well and went about my day.I noticed that my hair dried slower than it normally does and that it felt a little sticky, but it wasn't uncomfortable. After it dried, I could tell a difference. My normally frizzy and tangled hair was really silky and soft.  Like, TV-level soft and smooth. It didn't knot as easily, and I even noticed that my natural wave was more prominent. I really like this stuff. I think I'll continue to buy. And the best part: I smell like cookies!

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Hair Smoothie For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin B5, Paraben Free Hair Treatment, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Use as Hair Gel
Review: I am in the military and have to slick my hair back in uniform. Using the hair gel is tough on my hair and frankly feels gross. So I use this to slick my hair back and it works really well. I have to put on a helmet throughout the day and there's never any flacking like with gel. Also, i use this when I'm styling my hair and need something to keep my flyaways down I use this and only this. Great product, It's a different formula now than when I started using the product, which I think the old version is way better the new formula still gets the job done.

I just tried the smoothie the other day, because I know that sometimes different products in a line work better than others. It was wasn't good to, or for my natural hair. The product sat on my hair, opposed to melding with my strands. I did not use very much. I had to wash it out. If it works for other's natural hair, or processed hair, good on them. This is not a product I will ever be buying again. I really dislike wasting my money.

I don't use conditioner and I wash my hair with lush shampoo bars, and I find this helps my hair stay very manageable and soft until my next wash unlike regular conditioner has done. I leave it on pretty much my whole shower and rinse with cooler water. The smell is very nice but doesn't seem to stay in my hair long.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: Scent non existant - Is this watered down with something?
Review: EDIT- Turns out that they changed the formula. I'm really sick of Carol's Daughter constantly changing the formulas for their products. I use alot of their stuff and it's gotten to the point where whenever I order something I have no idea what I am going to get. They've also changed their leave in and replenishing oil multiple times as well as the shampoo and conditioner.I just received this product in the mail and it smells like literal water with a barely noticeable hint of vanilla. My last bottle smelled fantastic. I'm not sure whether Carols Daughter altered the formula, or if the seller diluted it, but something is different and I am reluctant to put it in my hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: They have changed the formula!!!
Review: This new oil is dry and drying. It does not add any moisture to black hair. It's is just a super thin layer of chemicals with an approximation of the original scent. I was expected to get moisturizing hair oil. This is is not moisturizing at all, even though the packaging is the same. Do not get the array of chemicals in the spray bottle. You will be better off preparing your own formulation with almond oil, vanilla, coconut oil (liquid form), and some calendula oil. This is not really Carol's Daughters as we knew it many years ago. So, for long-time lovers of Carol's daughter, this product false packaging and false advertising, and it not prepared for natural African-American hair texture--maybe weaves or braids, but not natural hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: amazing shine!!! great on fried hair
Review: i bought this because my human hair wig was getting super frizzy and gross from having been dyed a lot. y’all who know, that bleach-fried hair is Not easy to get rid of. that whole issue is literally why i cut off all my hair and wear wigs in the first place, but i swear if i had this product earlier i’d probably still have gorgeous, long, pink (or whatever color) hair lol. basically, this is the best anti frizz spray i’ve ever encountered

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: Don't be fooled, this is NOT a moisturizer!
Review: I guess I should have read the ingredients. I went off product description and reviews. If you're getting this for moisture know that it in itself is NOT a moisturizer! This is a SEALER! It has lots of oils that will SEAL moisture in your hair but that's it. There are ALOT of cheaper sealers. I use 100% virgin/unrefined organic coconut oil, or Extra virgin, organic, olive oil. This WILL NOT provide moisture. Water is not even listed in the ingredients! You can not have moisture without water. Water= moisture, oils=seal in moisture. A real moisturizer ALWAYS has WATER listed as one of the top ingredients. The people who have had success w this are probably using it after they shower, or when their hair is wet. This would work to keep the hair moisturized after applying water, but if you spray this on dry hair it will do nothing except add shine bc of the oil. That's not adding moisture.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: Love Oil----PACKAGING SUCKS
Review: Love this product!! This is like my third bottle! I have low porosity natural black hair and this oil os perfect because it is super light.NOW, on this order i lost a good bit of my product, and hence my money, in the box because it LEAKED!!! Not cool; secure the tops of bottles please! This one was slightly loose n oil leaked everywhere

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: Needs a Mist spray!
Review: This is my FAVORITE product of all time. I spray it everywhere. Hair, body, feet. Often as a mix with lotions. Daughter teases me because I have one in every room. Keeps my very blonde Sisterlocks healthy.  Would be a five but the first time I bought it there was a mist spray now its a regular spray and I like the mist much better. I mix this with an essential oil for hair growth and oh my its wonderful.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: Leaves hair greasy, not moisturized.
Review: This left my hair looking and feeling very greasy and I did not use that much! I tried a few different times and had to wash my hair right away, as I looked like I hadn't washed it in a week! Will not buy again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: Too Heavy
Review: I always wanted to try the Carols Daughter brand, and I thought this would be a safe start. Way too costly for the amount, let’s begin there. But it’s not a fine mist like sheen at all. Comes out in streams, which applies way too much product for your hair. It gets weighed down, and defeats the purpose of clean, flowy hair. Nice scent, but this is the reason many still use aerosol sprays.. for the evenness of application.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: Great Product
Review: Fast delivery. Oil smells like vanilla - love it!  Gives my hair a nice shine. Spritz without getting product on your clothes.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: Wonderful smell
Review: Used this when I started to wear my 4c hair natural. It smells amazing and leaves my hair feeling soft.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: I just love Carol’s Daughter
Review: I just love Carol’s Daughter. This Black Vanilla collection is everything I could ever want in a line. It is truly amazing and gives my hair ALL of the life that it needs. This oil spray is light, but moisture-retaining. A couple of sprays before I leave my house and I’m good to go!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: Wrong item
Review: This is the oil not the sheen.  Unless they changed the ingredients. This oil is darker with waaay more ingredients. The label says sheen but its not the same.  Im not happy.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: Great for Flat Ironing!
Review: This is all we use in our house when we flat iron our hair. Smell is amazing, I get compliments all the time. But you have to like the smell of vanilla. I know some people hate it, so buyer beware. Otherwise, it’s lightweight and a little goes a long way. I have thin hair and my daughter has thick hair and it works great for both of us.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: Loving scent and gives a great sheen
Review: I have only have one other sheen/shine spray before this one and I believe I only used it on wigs or when I had brand extensions in my hair. It has been a while since then, that other spray was by OGX. This spray I use on my natural hair. Today, I set my hair in some 2 strand twists and sprayed this on it. The smell is to die for. It really put a nice shine on my hair without weighting it down. It would be nice if the bottle had a larger misting area. Other than that highly recommend!!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: It really works ,LOVE MY HAIR NOW
Review: Omg my hair has gone from fried frizzy dull to shiny soft thank you so much.I will never use anything but your products from now on.I use to have beautiful long hair but had to have radiation and chemo .Gone was my beautiful hair but it saved my life that was 28 yrs ago. But with your products I now have hope ,I now LOVE ❤️ my hair thankyou .

Title: No.
Review: This left my hair so greasy and gross looking/feeling. I wash my hair every 2-3 days and the morning after I washed, it looked like I hadn’t washed in a week.Throwing this directly in the trash.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz

Disappointed.

It is like putting oil in your hair.  It is very greasy and smells like rancid oil.  If you want a leave in conditioner don't order this, make sure you order the leave in..

Title: LOVE CAROL'S DAUGHTER PRODUCTS

Title: The seller packaged this great and shipped it very quick
Review: The seller packaged this great and shipped it very quick. I love the black vanilla shampoo and conditioner, (though it does leave my hair heavy so I either use them separately or use conditioner only on the bottom of my hair). This stuff smells just like it, but I simply cannot use it. It's very oily and not the type of shine or mist I was hoping for. It makes my hair too greasy no matter how little I try to use. I've even tried spraying it on my fingers and doing it that way... yeah, no. But, it would likely be great for other hair types (mine is fine and dry). As would the shampoo & conditioner.

Title: Five Stars

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: No Parabens, No Mineral Oil, No Artificial Colors, No Petroleum and it smells DELICIOUS!
Review: This is one of my daughter's favorite hair products. She has 1/2 relaxed and 1/2 natural hair, as she's growing out her relaxer. Her hair was bra strap length, but as she's been growing out her relaxer our hair dresser has been cutting more and more of the relaxer out of her hair. Also, because we're not experts at this type of transition, some of her hair was falling out because we weren't taking care of it properly.Now we know how to wash, condition and brow dry it so it doesn't fall out as much.One of the requirements of natural hair is oil. Moisturize, moisturize, moisturize! According to the hair dresser, there is never enough oil that's too much for natural hair. We're slowly learning that she's 100% correct. We use moisturizing shampoo and conditioner, we use a heat protectant spray before blow drying and then we use a sheen to give additional moisture to her hair.She uses it in the morning after she's styled her hair and at night before she puts her bonnet on her head. You don't have to spray a lot, just a few squirts will do. It gives her hair a nice sheen and it smells delicious!The best part? No Parabens, No Mineral Oil, No Artificial Colors, No Petroleum.Honestly, I wasn't sure if the formulation of Carl's Daughter's products would change after they were bought out by a large company. I'm glad to see they're staying true to their roots (pun intended) and keeping their products as natural as can be.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have waist length,  color treated, natural wavy hair.  I'm also almost 58 so I have age related thinning and brittleness to deal with too.  My hair looks great when I just let it air dry but once a  comb or brush touches it: POOF!  Frizz city!I have used various anti-frizz products but didn't really like the way they made my hair feel.  This product makes my hair feel soft, look shiny and smell great.  I love this so much I cancelled my subscription to Fekkai glossing cream. I was initially afraid that this would make my hair too greasy since my hair is in the normal to fine range and anybody with fine hair knows how "deadly" oil can be, laying waste to many a hair style.  Not to worry.  Now, I just spray a little of this in my hands, rub them together, then rake my fingers through my damp hair.  Once dry I can brush my hair without frizz, just shine.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I decided to give this a try because I had heard Carols Daughter had some great products. I also knew CD was originally for AA hair, but the description said all hair types and I thought they might be branching out with this product. I gave it a try on my straight white girl hair and it was just too heavy, so I gave it to my biracial sister who has type 2&3 curls on her head of fine hair. She ends up straightening her hair and finds the Black Vanilla Moisture leaves her hair soft and shiny. She does not feel that it is heavy.  She said it gives enough weight to tame fly aways and keep her smooth.  It also works great when she pulls her hair back in a ponytail to work out. The fragrance is very strong (but nice) and could compete with your perfume.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: Great for maintaining curls between wash days
Review: I absolutely love this stuff! I have type 3B, springy curls that are more frizzy and dry than kinky. So it's always a struggle to find something that's heavy enough to moisturize my curls but light enough not to weigh them down and make them greasy. This works well for days 2 - 5. I spray it on at night, do two strong twists, put on a silk scarf and then untwist in the morning for soft, shiny curls. I have no complaints. I'm really glad they carry it at Target bow. It's more affordable and accessible than when they only carried this line at Macy's. I hope people will continue to buy it. The smell is gentle and not at all overpowering like some natural hair care products. I plan to use this on my daughter's hair when she is a little older to keep it soft and manageable.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This wonderful product, which contains Shea Butter Jojoba Oil  Sweet Almond  and Wheat Germ  oils, is a BLESSING for my hair-- Even though my hair is very short and baby-fine, I use this (sparingly because a little goes a long way) at night, put a watch cap over it and wash it out with Carol's Daughter (clay) Shampoo in the morning -- it nourishes and makes my hair BRILLIANT.This is better than anything store-bought that I have ever used in the past and much more natural.Excellent price, with my short short hair this should last a long long time, and when I run out, I run out to get more.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: My ends are a bit fried after bleaching and dyeing, and since this says it works on all hair types, I decided to give it a try. It smells amazing, the scent isn't too strong but it does stay with you for a while. And it REALLY does give a lot of shine. Use sparingly. You might want to try spraying a little in your hand or on your fingers if you're targeting a certain area. But yes, it does indeed give a nice 'sheen' to the hair and does seem to help moisturize (not surprising considering its oil ingredients). The bottle should last a long while. Just be aware that there is a scent to it if you're sensitive and might be a trial period if you're going to be spraying it on (just try a spritz or two at first).

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: TOP 500 REVIEWER
Review:
The Black Vanilla scent of Carol's Daughter is one of my favorite scents.  Since my waves are fine, it's too much to spray this directly on my hair, so I use one spray in my palm and then smooth it over my hair.  It adds a lovely shine.I didn't realize before ordering this that it does contain silicone (in the form of cyclomethicone), so if you're following the Curly Girl Method, I'd suggest using 

Carols Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Pure Hair Oil, 4.3 Ounce

   instead.  The Pure Hair Oil has similar ingredients, but no silicone.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: Adds shine, takes a while to absorb.
Review: I like this product.  It smells nice, but the scent is light.  The sprayer functions well, but I do tend to spray it onto my hands and distribute that way.  A little helps a lot.  I do find it takes a while to absorb into my hair, so I typically apply it at night.  Adds shine and hydration and helps my hair look healthier.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: For reference, I have baby fine hair that gets oily at the scalp line and is dry on the ends and at times snaps easily. The instructions on this oil type spray, say to spray on dry hair. If I do that, it makes my hair look very oily and limp. It works much better on my fine hair if I use it while my hair is wet and then spray only 2 sprays and pick it through. The best thing about this spray is the pleasant and sweet almond and vanilla scent. I would not recommend this for very fine hair like mine, it isn't bad but, I think this would work better on coarser and much drier hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: First try of Carol's daughter
Review: I have always heard great things about Carol’s Daughter products. I had not tried it before so I jumped at the chance to give it a try. This spray was a little more greasy than I expected. I have fine hair, so it is easy to weigh down. I realized I needed to use less. It doesn’t take much so use sparingly. It does give an shine to the hair and has a nice smell.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I use oil a lot in my hair. It helps keep it from drying out as I use a blow dryer and flat iron daily. It also makes a good texturizer. This formula is less greasy and it sprays a fine mist over large sections. I use it sometimes before I use the flatiron or after I'm done I will use it if my hair seems dry. My hair gets soft and shiny but doesn't look oily. This can be used on any type of hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: Bring your hair back to life!
Review: I really liked this oil and my hair did too! It is very moisturizing ,light weight and most of all non greasy. It smells awesome as well. A bit pricey but worth it!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is a sheen so it's purpose is to add shine to your hair.. I tried it on my husbands hair, he's 3C and it made him look glossy :) also, the next morning, it was still moisturized. Kind of on the greasy side, but maybe I sprayed too much.I have 4 C hair so of course the effects will be different. It more so kept it moisturized than shiny. If I were to blow it out, it would probably stay shiny as well. :)Major bonus...the smell

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: Two stars for the smell
Review: I'm only giving this two stars because of the amazing smell.  Otherwise, this didn't moisturize my hair at all.  I have thick, curly, dry hair.  It left my already dry hair even drier and feeling like straw.  Also, it made it really hard to comb through when wet...almost like I put powder in my hair.  Anyway, I will continue to use it, but only lightly as a hair fragrance.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: Wonderful product at a really fair price
Review: Absolutely GREAT product.  I suffer from dry everything.  I am 68 years old.  My skin is dry, my eyes are dry and of course my hair is dry.  When I need to have healthy looking hair (which is all the time) I hold the spray bottle about 6-8 inches from my hair and spritz this product on.  It leaves my hair with a healthy shine and smelling wonderful.  Don't miss out on this great product at this great price.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz

The Shampoo lathers up and leaving my hair silky smooth, adding the Carols Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen gives my tired hair life and shine with a the Best Vanilla scent. My hair still looks and feels silky smooth the day after. Very good Products with a true scent without smelling fake.

Title: Carols Daughter Oil
Review: I have processed blond hair, this oil is wonderful It only takes a couple of drops.  I use daily working into my scalp and brushing to add shine.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hair Sheen for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, and Sweet Almond Oil, Paraben Free Hair Sheen, 4.3 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Instantly adds a nice shine to my hair when it gets dull and dry.  The combination of oils makes a lightweight product that doesn't weight down my hair.I also use it as a body spray to moisturize my skin.  It absorbs quickly and my skin feels silky.

Title: Report abuse
Review: Good moisture vanilla oil....reduces dryness and breakage. It keeps my hair moistured. Although people have different hair textures so, what works for me may not work for some people.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Carols daughttterrr YESSSS LOC method
Review: This stuff is SUUUUPER thick but if your hair is as dry as mine. Then you NEED this m i use this as a cream in my LOC method for my 4c/4b type hair and ive received nothing but positive results. Just dont over do it because youll get a grey tint film over your hair and it'll slightly cause build up. OTHERWISE EPIC IN A JARbtw it lasted me damn there a month and a half

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Type 4 hair - Top moisturizer - Twist-outs, Braid-outs +
Review: This fully moisturizes 4 a/b/c hair with medium porosity. I like this even better than healthy hair butter. I wash my hair, twist it with Marguerite's Magic, let it dry, take it out and my hair is super soft.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Good on 4c hair!
Review: I never really try new creams because I’m usually disappointed so I just stick with My old faithful TGIN butter cream. However, I had a urge to start trying more stying products so I gave this a try and I’m glad I did! It’s really thick which is a plus for me and It makes my hair so shiny, soft and really manageable when combing through. The only thing I initially didn’t really enjoy was the smell but, I can get use to it because i really like how this makes my hair feel and look! I think it will work for any hair type but, if your hair is a looser texture use a smaller amount.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: An old time favorite.
Review: I used this product years ago and for some reason I got away from the brand as a whole. I noticed lately my hair looks dull and lifeless no matter what I use and none of the many oils and shampoos I have purchased were helping to do anything but weigh my hair down and make it feel and look dirty. I grabbed this in an attempt to salvage my hair and I'm glad I did. From the first use my hair was softer and looked like there was new life in it. I've rubbed it into my scalp and said goodbye to the itchy feeling the winter brought there. I've noticed less shedding come wash day too. I'm in love all over again.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great hair cream
Review: Really like.  I read previous reviews before using and many said a little goes a long way  If too much is used, a residue will form.  After co wash I put my oils also Vera and used this for a twist out  I fingered combed it using carol’s daughter mimosa hair honey  on my fingers and palm  Loving hair day!

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: The worst garbage I’ve ever used
Review: This is thicker than any body butter I’ve ever used. It refused to distribute thru my hair and made it nearly un brushable so I don’t know how this has any renewing or replenishing properties. It actually was so bad I had to re wash my whole head and then re take a shower when the itch and grime of it’s transfer to my body kicked in. The fragrance isn’t so much lavender like it mentions and is really quite strong- I like strong smells and this one got to me. Seriously the worst thing I’ve ever ordered from amazon

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: would not recommend
Review: i have high porosity hair, i tried this for both a twist out & a moisturizer and it was awful for both. It was extremely thick, gave me terrible build up & i used a small amount of product considering it was so thick. Thicker creams usually are beneficial for my hair, but there was something about this one that just wasn’t very hydrating, caused major build up, & it felt like it was just sitting on top of my hair.. All to say, i would not recommend for high porosity hair

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Keeping Hair Moist
Review: Now a staple in my hair care regimen. This product is light, but nit greasy. I am using it on areas where I have breakage and want to keep the hair moist. I've even used this overnight with a plastic cap and it does wonders.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: You will love what it does to your hair.
Review: I love this product and it's one of those you won't believe until you use it.  My hair was over perm.  Then I went natural for several months and didn't take care of it at all.  I was just waiting until I was forced to wear a wig.  Then my attitude changed.  I wanted to try again with my own hair.  I saw this product and decided to give it a try.  I had tried everything else on the market many years before.  I wore my hair in a fizzy, patted down, nappy natural.  My hair had grown a little with me wearing a natural and not combing it but it was in really bad shape from lack of care.  No moisture, no shine, frizzy and no life.  I washed my hair with a shampoo I hoped would lighten my gray then I used this cream and oil while it was still wet.  The most notable thing the first time I used it was how easy it was to comb my hair.  There were no tangles, less friz and only a few strains of my hair came out in the comb.  I believed that was because it had been so long since I combed it.  My hair was still easy to comb two days later although I had only treated my hair that once.  By the third time I used the cream and oil my hair was as soft as baby hair, manageable, laid flat, no friz and possible to comb with my fingers.  I Still have dull gray hair and think that maybe why my hair isn't shining yet.  The nap of my hair actually feels wavy.  My hair is longest at the nap of my neck.  Never had curly, soft or wavy hair.  I felt a dramatic difference after the third time I used it and that was all within the first week.  That's when I fell in love and knew I never wanted to be without either of them.  I'm so impressed I have ordered the shampoo and conditioner.  I have them all scheduled for redelivery every two months that's how much I love it.  The only thing left to say is you won't be sorry if you try it.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: I love this product
Review: I love this product.  It’s not sticky or too heavy for my naturally curly hair, and it gives me the perfect amount of control and locks in moisture.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: My locs were breaking off really bad especially in the front
Review: Works well on my hair. My locs were breaking off really bad especially in the front, but this product has helped bring my hair back to life. It's light so it doesn't feel too heavy on my hair. The smell is great. A bit on the expensive side, but in many ways, it's worth it. And since I can't purchase it in the neighborhood I live in since the hair shops out here do not cater to Black women, Amazon saves the day once again. I will continue to purchase this product as long as it continues to do wonders on my hair. Very pleased.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Feels Wonderful.
Review: This stuff is wonderful for my hair.  Some moisturizers leave the hair a little crunchy after it dries.  This moisturizer keeps my hair soft and completely moisturized.  I really like Carol's Daughter products.Update: 7/12/21. This is still keeping my 4c high porosity hair moisturized.  The problem is that  I was just getting to order another jar, and the price jumped from $7.00 to $14.00.  What is going on?  Shame on the merchant for hiking up the price so high.  $14.00 is too much.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Makes such a difference
Review: This stuff is GOLDEN!! It’s like liquid gold. Lasting moisture.. makes a difference and your hair feels much smoother and softer. I recommend!!

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Makes hair soft and manageable.
Review: When I first used this on my daughter’s hair I did not get the expected results. I was disappointed and put it away. My daughter has natural black hair type 4c and I needed a product that would make her hair manageable without me having to straighten her hair all the time and one that would keep her hair from breaking and tangling. So several months later I decided to try it again and this time round it worked. It made it easy for me to detangle and brush without hurting her and without breaking the hair. It makes the hair soft and easy to work with. I highly recommend it and if it doesn’t work the first time don’t toss it away just give it another try it might end up working like it did for me.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Fantastic product, good price
Review: I've ordered this a couple of times from Amazon.com.  Previously, I ordered it from the manufacturer.  I don't understand why the price of this product varies from order to order on Amazon, but to date it's still $3 to $6 less expensive than ordering from the manufacturer (not including shipping from the manufacturer--I have Prime with Amazon).  Price aside, this is my single favorite hair-care product.  I have semi-coarse, thick, curly hair that has ALWAYS been dry.  I use this on my hair right after shampooing as a leave-in conditioner.  On my type of hair, it NEVER flattens or leaves my hair greasy--only soft.  And it helps to smooth frizziness (no product I've ever tried has ever completely tamed them).  This is the one hair product I can't do without.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Excellent moisturizer
Review: I’ve used Carol’s daughter for a long time. My hair had become dry due to a medication & treatments. This is perfect for restoring the moisture back into your hair. I apply daily at bedtime along with brushing my hair. I don’t have to use much. Don’t pack on, you should measure based on the length of your hair. This product doesn’t leave any residue after it’s brushed on the hair.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Easily the best hair product I have ever purchased.
Review: I’m a 40-year-old woman with thick, frizzy, naturally curly hair. Over my lifetime, I have bought more products to tame my hair than I could shake a stick at...so keep that in mind when I say that this is, hands down, the best thing I’ve ever bought for my hair. It tames the frizz without weighing it down and dampening the curl. It has a light baby powder scent and is priced perfectly. I love the Carol’s Daughter brand, but this is, undeniably, the best product of theirs - or anyone’s - that I’ve ever put in my hair. Thank you, Lisa and Margeurite, and please never stop making this stuff!

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great Moisturizer
Review: This doesn’t work well in my hair at all but it is my favorite body lotion ever now!I love the light whipped shea butter it’s so easy to smooth on. Normally my Shea butter creations are like putty but this goes on like frosting!It turned my hair to gross cement when applying to the ends and dry parts, it just made that part gross and sticky like I put a bunch of hair thickening foam or styling agent on. My husband has thicker hair and he really liked it in his hair :-)Either way I recommend.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Moisture and Hair Dress all in one
Review: Great product for all hair types, especially if you have thicker hair. This product is cream based and doesn’t take much to get the moisture you need. It also doubles as hair dress, leaving your curls and waves slick as if it was dressed with pomade. However, because of its thick nature, you will need to wash your hair regularly to prevent build-up (builds up pretty quickly with daily use). Smells great!

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Merchant Has Doubled The Price - Bad Business
Review: Love the product. Keeps my hair shiny, healthy, soft and moisturized. Highly recommend this cream - best product Carol’s Daughter makes in my opinion. What I don’t love? The fact that the price went from $7 to $14. I’ve ordered this product 3 times in the past two months -  and the price was consistent. All of a sudden - the price has now jumped to double. Disappointed.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Greasy.  OMG it is so greasy!
Review: Bought this bc it said for extra dry so I used for some flat twists [so a fair amount] and unlike the Coco Creme [same brand] the inside of the twists were still greasy - just sat on the hair...I think it left the outer part only bc I work out and wear hats...Pretty sure I will NOT rebuy this and will stick with what I know...the Coco Creme Cream :)

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Love this cream
Review: I love this hair cream. I have yet to be able to find another one product that can replicate what this does for my 4C hair. It is moisturizing and softens the hair so well. It also defines my curls - but doesn’t have hold so I just use it to 2 strand twist my hair.  I used this to braid my seven yr old’s hair as well and her hair turns out beautiful without overloading it with different products. My mother has also realized this product is great for refreshing her “TWA”. This cream is definitely staying in my hair product rotation permanently.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: This product loves your hair, & your loves it back.
Review: I have used this brand before, I loved then and even more now, it has a wonderful fragrance,it is light to the touch and makes love to your hair.!!! The jar I purchased was an ample amount, which I am so happy about,but when it's gone I will surely purchase another one...I don't ever intend to be without it.P.S  I have to get one for my husband now  because he tried mine and now he's a fan..

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: NO FRIZZ! Extremely DEFINED TWIST OUT
Review: I recently changed to this product because my other favorite twisting cream was allowing my hair to frizz up during the summer weather in NYC which is very humid. I have thick, slightly course, dry hair.This cream does not frizz up my hair at all and my twist outs are extremely defined and shiny! My hair looks the same from morning til night during the warm humid weather. I find that I do need to put alot of cream in each section of my hair when I twist it though, but it works, so I don’t mind.The smell isn’t very pleasant, just smells like a natural Shea butter but I got use to it. The smell is very, very mild when it’s in your hair.I LOVE THIS CREAM. BEST TWIST OUT ON MY TYPE 4 HAIR.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: not for me
Review: pros:-cute packaging-light, fresh smell. not at all fake or cloying - smells sweetly herbal-pleasing texture, a bit like thickened coconut oilcons:-if I apply too little, I see no difference in dryness-if I apply too much, my hair won't dry and stays greasy through two washes-difficult to apply, did not soak into my hair well

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Love, love
Review: Love, love, love this product. Was a little afraid it would be too heavy for my hair, but it moisturizes really well and adds a great sheen, When first put on it feels greasy and heavy but absorbs well..I usually put it on at night and wrap my hair. I highly recommend it. I have texlax hair with tracks. Not heavy for the weave as well. Not a fan of the fragrance but thankfully that disappears after a while. A little goes a long way. Make sure to massage it in well. I will definitely repurchase.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: For ethnic hair.  Left my “non ethnic” hair very greasy
Review: Soooo...I didn’t research this product enough before buying.  When I used it (as directed) my hair was left extremely greasy.  I generally wash my hair twice a week and this made it look like it had been over a week after I washed and styled it.I did not realize it is primarily for ethnic hair.  I’m sure it works GREAT for the correct hair type.  I love the shampoo, conditioner and spray on leave in conditioner and will likely continue using them.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Yet another disappointment....
Review: No more hair products for me from Amazon.  Nothing ever is at is described.  Just another waste of heard earned money.  I will not tell anyone to avoid this product because we each have different experiences depending on hair type, but for one wh has baby fine dray hair...not helpful at all.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: PERFECT for 4c hair
Review: This product is amazing on my 4c hair I love Carol's Daughter products from her shampoo to her conditioning sprays they help manage and grow my 4c hair this item makes my hair easy to comb through and keeps it very well moisturized compare to all other products I have tried on my hair this is the one that works

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: It really provides moisture
Review: I love this product. I used this on my 7 year old biracial daughters very dry hair and it brought it back to life. It really moistures her dry hair. I put it on her hair damp and dry and it provides shine, moisture and it is not a greasy feel. I will be buying this again.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Can’t use
Review: I didn’t realize this was leave in conditioner. Don’t know if I missed seeing that by not paying attention or if it was obscure information.  I tried to use it as a leave in, used too much, had to rewash my hair.  Eventually I will probably throw away the remaining product.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Would not buy again
Review: First I can't stand the smell of this product, reminds of cough medicine. The consistency is very hard to work with but I used the whole jar to give it a fair chance. Have not seen any improvement in my hair whatsoever. I tried it as a leave in, a mask, a deep conditioner and using it only on the ends and its awful. Makes my hair stiff and more unmanageable. I have very thick curly hair so anything that makes it more unruly is out of the question. Takes a few shampoos to get it out of my hair as well. I tried but would not use again or recommend but hey everyone is different.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Gotta try this!
Review: I loved that this is the first product of Carol’s daughter that I’ve tried and immediately could see the difference. My hair was soft and manageable! I have very course hair and couldn’t believe how much better it feels. Can’t wait to try the other products!

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Adds moisture
Review: I’ve been using this product for years. My hair is very curly and dry as most curly hair is.Margaritte’s Magic adds back moisture. I also massage it into my scalp. A little goes a long way. I use it most every day.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great product
Review: This stuff is crack to my hair. It smells good and leaves my hair feeling very moisturized. A little goes a long way. Have been using for about a month and my hair feels softer and more moisturized. I love this product.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Healthy crown!
Review: I love the light scent and the lightweight feel of the product. I use it as the Cream in my Liquid Oil Cream routine. Helps my natural style 4c hair stay moist for days.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Too oily and sticky
Review: It’s too oily and sticky for my hairs. I had to wash my hair after I applied and it was still sticky after I washed. I’m not sure if it’s because I don’t have thick hairs but it’s not for me.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Might just be me....
Review: I’m regifting this product, mainly because I’m now on a loc journey.  However, the scent smells like grandma’s  perfume.  It’s a little drying and not at all what I expected based on YouTube reviews.🤷🏽‍♀️ Sorry...I really wanted to like it.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Just right!!!
Review: Its my second order of this hairdress, the best on the market, it moisturizes without leaving your hair weighed down and oily...

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Winning product
Review: I am in love with this product. It moisturizes and softens and I just can't keep my hands out of my hair. I use it on my scalp and along the braid to where my hair stops when I have in box braids. This will now definitely be a staple

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Purchase this!!!!
Review: Listen! I was real skeptical about buying this. I wanted something else from the company but it was out of stock so I went with this instead. I really saw a huge difference after using it. I have real dry hair and this made my hair so soft and hydrated. I used it for a protective style. I haven't removed the style as yet, so I I not sure how my hair looks right now. But I can't wait to see.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Not what I expected
Review: I tried this on my hair the other day. It made my hair dry and hard. Yes it brought the curls out but it wasn't what I've expected. Thought it would bring life and sheen to my hair. But instead it did the opposite. The directions said it can be used on wet or dry hair. I washed it out of my hair and tried it while my hair was wet. Still no difference. So I gave it to my son. Hopefully it will work better on his hair

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Nice product
Review: At first, I did not like this product but it might have been because I was not using it in the way my hair liked. I used it to moisturize my braids/twist and it works well. It is very thick and I have to rub it on my hands thoroughly before putting on my hair or it will just chunk on my hair. I have 4c/b low porosity hair. It goes well with other products.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great for hair care
Review: My beautician noticed that my hair got thicker and asked was I was using.  Told her I was using this.  My hair has grown and I like the smell too.  My hair is manageable and moisturized.  Don't be shy, give it a try!

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: So Far So Good....
Review: Finding good products that actually work for African American hair types can be a difficult task.  I've been on the hunt for good hair products that moisturizes, reduce flakes, safe for relaxed/color treated hair, helps breakage, and doesn't weigh your hair down.  I've tried almost everything!!  From Soft Sheen (Anti Breakage/Dandruff), Organic Root Stimulator (Carrot Oil, Coconut Oil, Hair Fertilizer), Sulfur 8, Top Brass, Dr. Miracle, Motions, Castor Oil, etc.  But I was never completely satisfied with either of those products.  They either didn't work, still had flakes, didn't smell too great, or weighed my hair down.Carol's Daughter Marguerite to the RESCUE!!! I LOVE the smell of this hairdress.  This is my 1st time using it and so far my hair feels light, moisturized, and smells GREAT! The price is a little steep for a hairdress but I think it may be worth it.  You don't need to use much so 1 jar could last you a good while.  As I continue to use this product I will update my review if I experience any changes.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Moisture!
Review: My hair is old and I take prescription drugs. This cream really helps keep my hair moisturized and neat.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great product.
Review: I love how my hair feels and smells after I use this product. It totally controls my hair frizz, gives my hair extra body and leaves my hair manageable, tangle free, and moisturized! I will definitely continue to buy Carol's Daughter products from now on, thank you for providing such high quality hair care products that does exactly what is advertised.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great for controlling friz
Review: Love this product.  I have tried others and they never work as well.  At one point I couldn't find this product,  and my hair was a frizzy mess for a few months.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Very pleased!
Review: It really moisturized my hair without making it heavy and smells great. I have 4c hair and it works great.

Product: Carol's Daughter Marguerite's Magic Restorative Cream, 8 oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Potential
