Review: My daughter has been like a fish this summer, but the chlorine is starting to take a toll on her hair. I have used this a few times and it works wonders! It smells delicious and it restores moisture and shine to her hair. I have been using Carol's Daughter for years and while I do not love all of their products, this is a keeper! Also a plus that it is made in the USA.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: Amazing Hair Mask!
Review: I have dry damaged hair that's naturally wavy frizzy. I've decided to replace regular conditioner with this hair mask after shampooing and I'm so impressed by how manageable my hair has become! The price is comparable to hair masks found at drug stores and IMO works better and I've tried so many! I have to get my hands on more products made by Carol's Daughter. I'm so impressed with the ingredients and quality of this product!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I had never heard of Carol's Daughter products. This coco creme shampoo lives up to its name. I washed my hair in it and to be honest, I was worried that it would be troublesome to wash out the shampoo. This is the creamiest shampoo I have ever used. It lathered so much from just a dash of shampoo.I love the fragrance.I didn't need to worry, the shampoo washed out just like any other shampoo, and it left a lovely scent.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: good hair mist
Review: This coconut mist feels so refreshing on my scalp. It does not feel like it moisturizes my hair but it does hydrate my hair. It smells really good. Its great to use to refresh your curls and fix the frizz.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I am a big fan of Carol's Daughter. After big chopping in '15, I used the black vanilla shampoo conditioner combo and it was a great addition to my hair regime to help it grow back quickly. I loved the smell of the black vanilla, but this coco creme is even better. Same great moisture and slippage even with my hard water situation out here in the desert.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This shampoo is terrific for dry, color treated hair like mine. Factor in the drying air of winter and my hair looks and feels like straw. Lightly fragranced, this shampoo lathers richly and rinses cleanly. It is moisturizing and leaves hair feeling healthy and soft. I would not use if hair is oily. Nor would I use it everyday. But it does ease dryness and make hair look and feel touchable.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: Great lather, good value
Review: I was a little surprised when I tried to pump this stuff; it's really thick, and my hair is quite long so I figured I'd have to keep banging away at the pump for quite a while.  But when I applied it, the lather was so rich and luxurious that I realized a little goes a very long way.  And the result?  My hair looks and feels nice.  This is something I think I could use every day and not have my hair turn into straw.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: Starts out sticky but...
Review: This curl creme gel works really well on my hair and gives my curls great definition. It’s a bit sticky which surprised me but works well. It doesn’t turn my hair stiff but actually made it softer.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: Works Well, Strong Perfume
Review: This mask does a nice job, making my hair (thick and coarse) very shiny and manageable, however it does have a bit of a strong odor (I am very sensitive to odors, I should admit).  It rinses out well, but that lingering coconut perfume does linger a bit.  It's a good mask, though, and I'm going to continue to use it until it's gone.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I thought I was going to like this conditioner, because I tried the leave-in conditioner and loved it.  However, this one didn't work as well.  My hair didn't feel moisturized and it really didn't do anything for my curls.  I'll stick with my current washout conditioner and use the leave-in version to add extra moisture.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This thick, luxurious, moisturizing coco butter shampoo is wonderful! First, I needed only a small amount, much less than I usually must use, when I shampooed my very long hair. This shampoo suds up easily and cleans as it moisturizes. After I used it, my hair was ultra-soft and tangle free. This shampoo contains no sulfates, parabens or artificial colors. It does contain coconut oil, milk, murumuru and mango butters, which hydrate and nourish the hair. It has a light and refreshing coconut scent. In addition, this wonderful shampoo comes in any easy-to-use pump bottle for your convenience. It is fairly priced for an excellent, concentrated shampoo.I received a free sample of this product in exchange for an unbiased review.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: Perfect for mixed hair
Review: My kids have different types of mixed hair. This works for both. It isn't greasy and leaves the hair shiny and with no fly-aways. I would definitely recommend for daily styling.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: Smells good
Review: This stuff smells pretty good but other than that I didnt really notice it doing anything for my hair. I have extremely dry and frizzy hair and this didnt do anything for that.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: Nice Results
Review: My wife used this last night after an apple cider application, so she had a cap on for a long time.  She loved it!  Her hair today is shiny and healthy looking.  The cider is to fight dry scalp / flaking (black long hair) and the Coco mask helps repair all of the damage.  She loved it and will order more.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: Natural type 4
Review: I was quite surprised that this product worked for me, my hair tends to not like anything. It was very moisturizing, it left my natural hair so soft and manageable. Not to mention the smell is great!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: A May Zing Conditoner!!!!
Review: I use hair masks 2 to 3 times a week on my super fried home dyed curly blonde hair and this conditioner alone made my hair softer and smoother than any of the masks!!! I cannot get enough of this product, I'm hooked for life!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: Best. Thing. Ever.
Review: I think I’ve finally, FINALLY found something that works with my hair. I have 4b/4c (really more 4c) and it's always been a challenge keeping moisture. I read the reviews & decided to try. I absolutely love it ❤️ it kept my hair moisturized from the moment I put it on until even now overnight. It’s not too heavy, my hair drank it up & no residue was left. I’m going to stock up & cant wait to try on my daughters’ hair!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Not too fond of this curl shaping jelly. It made my hair feel dry & kinda hard. Made my curls very tight. The scent is cool but nothing that stands out.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is very creamy, and I wouldn’t use it with the shampoo as it left my hair heavy.  But as a special conditioner and treatment for dry heat. This is a terrific conditioner, and I love the delicate coco smell - not synthetic at all.  As I wash my hair every day, re sports, I use this once a week as a nice treatment, and it does the job beautifully.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This shampoo smells so good! I love the tropical scents!  It's also not "heavy" and doesn't weigh my hair down at all.  It doesn't have a high foaming lather, but it lathers just enough to clean the hair well.  My hair smelled good all day and I didn't look greasy at the roots by the end of the day.  Plus, sulfate free? Yes, please!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: A little pricey, but well worth it. Carols delivery again with this product, I have thick curly hair and after adding this to my routine, my hair has become a lot more manageable.  Curls look much tighter, hair is softer and has a nice shine, and it makes it much more easy to style! i love it, find something that works and stick to it!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: Great for Wash and Gos

Title: Excelente para cabello rizado

My hair was much more manageable and hydrated before I started to use these products. Now my hair sheds like crazy and I constantly have to add moisture. Note: My hair is naturally a fine and soft 4c hair.

Title: Extremely popular at my house.
Review: I liked every thing about this - the smell, the feel, the detangling without greasiness, and even how  the pump delivered the right amount.  It was more expensive than the conditioner we usually buy,and went faster,  but with my frizz factory college girl gone away I'll buy more.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Very subtle coconut smell, but works wonders for curly fizzy hair. I have been using this the last week, and my curls are tighter and my hair doesn't frizz as easily, of course i combine with about 4 other hair products, but a great step to include when living with curly frizzy hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz

Review: This conditioner smells great! It also works really well and makes my long hair very soft without feeling like I didn't rinse out the conditioner from my hair. The bottle is kind of small, but it is good fro travel I suppose. I like that even for a small bottle, it has a pump.

Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This spray smells great, its lightweight and does the trick for my day old curls.

Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This mask smells awesome, like mango and coconut in suntan lotion. My hair is normally very dry but feels so soft and moisturized after using this mask. My hair is much more manageable and less frizzy. I've started using this weekly and it keeps my hair from drying out.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz

Review: I've used a few CD products before, not much, but a few. I am looking to get to know the product better as it has been recommended to me by many people. I've used it twice on my granddaughter's hair and so far I cannot see any real difference from other shampoos that I have used. I do like the fact that it is sulfate free. My granddaughter's hair is extremely dry and this is supposed to help with dryness. I will use this in conjunction with other CD products in hopes to achieve the desired result.

Like it's so moisturizing and makes me hair feel like the finest silk like babe get this just to try it

Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars

My wife and daughter give it five stars, I give it four and my son's opinion doesn't count.

Title: FINALLY A PRODUCT THAT WORKS FOR 4C HAIR
Review: At first I thought this would be another hair fail. I have 4C hair, and there are so many products that promise to be compatible that aren't, all they do is dry you hair out, and sit on top of it making it gritty and harder to manage. I have low porosity hair, and most products just don't work for me. I typically use this cream first, then add about a tablespoon of the Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Scalp Oil and Hair Oil Deep Treatment with Castor Oil, 7 Oil Blend and Black Seed Oil, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Hair Oil for Natural Hair, massage it in, and my hair is soft, and clearly moisturized.

Review: I purchased this product along with the curl enhancing moisture cream for my daughter who has 4c hair. It did not work for her hair at all see pics(last two) however for my hair it did great! I have 4a/4b hair. It defined my curls perfectly! The moisture was disappointing especially since this product is supposed to be for very dry hair; It was just ok. Overall I will not be purchasing it again for my daughter but MAY buy it for myself. If you have 4c hair save your money!

Title: Yes, yes, yes!!!
Review: This product is the answer to my prayers.My 11 year old daughter has curly hair and I've had trouble finding a good product that would nourish her hair while keeping it bouncy and CURLY.We've tried so many products in the past and while some worked for a while I kept lookingWell, I think we aced it with this leave in conditioner.We use it with a head wrap hair dryer bag that attaches to our hair dryer and run on COOL it for 20 minutes and OH MY GOSH, the result is BEAUTIFUL BOUNCY CURLS.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: The product is good but I can't stand the smell
Review: The product is a nice consistency and holds my curls well but the smell is extremely strong and reminds me of axe body spray or some other men's cologne.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: My new favorite!
Review: This conditioner is so moisturizing! I love the scent and the pump. Arrived in perfect condition.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: Not thick
Review: Great product for my hair type. Not too thick

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: Lots of moisture
Review: Non greasy and very good product

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: Spent 30 years looking for this
Review: I’ve literally been looking years for something like this for my very curly 3b/c frizz prone hair.  Most cremes are not strong enough to hold the curl and gels are too stiff and flaky and drying. This is perfect. I agree with other reviews that the scent is a bit strong and smells like mens cologne but I don’t hate it and it fades over time. I put it on damp hair in 4-5 sections and twist each section and then wrap around my finger and then shake my hair out. I usually wash my hair every other day and to reactivate I spray my hair down a bit and reapply some of the product. I understand that everyone’s hair is different and what may work for me may not for you but I’d definitely give this a try!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: Type 4 Ladies
Review: Best product I’ve purchased for my type 4 hair. I’m hooked.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: Love tgis
Review: Fast easy delivery works great and keep your hair is looking great

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: Love
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   Came in perfect this my second time buying it😇

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: Amazing product!
Review: I ordered this product for my biracial daughters hair. We have tried so many different products and nothing was able to tame her kinky curls & keep it moisturized throughout her school day. This is an amazing product that finally worked on her hair! Thank you so much and when you have a life time customer with us! 💯⭐️💕

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: Love the scent
Review: I really like the scent and howMy curls are defined, however next day my hair looks dry and dirty.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Rating: Style: Shampoo, Conditioner & Curl Butter Set
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: Me gusta el producto, al inicio fue complicado poner la cantidad necesaria sin hacer que mi cabello se viera duro, pero al encontrar la cantidad que necesito deja mi cabello muy bonito con rizos marcados, no se ve reseco, ayuda mucho con la hidratación. La consistencia del shampoo es un poco espesa y con muy poco es suficiente, el acondicionador está muy bien y deja un agradable olor.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Rating: Style: Shampoo, Conditioner & Curl Butter Set
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: Noticed my hair is not dry anymore and is feeling soft again.  Thank you

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Perfecting Water Coco Mist, with Coconut Water, Silicone Free Curl Refresher Spray, Paraben Free Curl Activating Mist for Very Dry, Curly To Coily Hair, 5, 8.4 Fl Oz
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: Retread my frizzy hair!! This and the Monoi Carol’s Daughter masks are really good. Don’t get the almond one though. It’s thick, and it makes your hair silky! If you have frizzy hair, you’ll still need something for your ends when your hair is dry, like Schwarzkopf for Ends.

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength Leave-In Conditioner Spray For Curly, Natural Hair, Moisturizing Heat Protectant with Castor Oil, 11 fl oz
Title: Very moisturizing
Review: I must honestly say that the Carol's Daughter Godess Strength line is one of my absolute favorite products to use on my natural 3c4a curls. It leaves my hair soft and moisturized. However this leave in has a very strong scent. I was so taken aback especially since one of the ingredients is black seed oil and the rest of the products have a more pleasant smell.I know black seed oil has a very distinctive smell so this will definitely not keep me from using this leave-in as I feel the pros far outweigh the con.

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength Leave-In Conditioner Spray For Curly, Natural Hair, Moisturizing Heat Protectant with Castor Oil, 11 fl oz
Title: HEAT PROTECTION
Review: I recently bought about four different brand items and researched heat products quite a bit.  One person said "does it make your hair feel like straw" so I was determined to find something that didn.tCarol's Daughter Goddess Strength is the end all to heat styling products.  I sprayed about 50 pumps and did my ends with another 5 pumps and used a heat brush to dry my hair. It is a fine mist so it isn't a lot of product.  It was like I just came out of the salon!  Soft and responds quite well to the heat brush.I would recommend this highly to anyone looking for a heat product.

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength Leave-In Conditioner Spray For Curly, Natural Hair, Moisturizing Heat Protectant with Castor Oil, 11 fl oz
Title: Just YUCK
Review: I have used a LOT of leave in products on my hair ( I have curly processed colored hair) so I use a leave in overnight to help. I'm sorry but I cannot get over the SMELL...it does linger and smells like dirt.  I don't care how good a product is, walking around with your hair smelling like you haven't washed it is something else.I threw it away and bought Living Proof Restoring spray instead....it was more but my hair feels and smells better. Save your money and your nose.

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength Leave-In Conditioner Spray For Curly, Natural Hair, Moisturizing Heat Protectant with Castor Oil, 11 fl oz
Title: i like
Review: so far so good

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength Leave-In Conditioner Spray For Curly, Natural Hair, Moisturizing Heat Protectant with Castor Oil, 11 fl oz
Title: Dries out hair
Review: Dries out both my kids hair really bad.

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength Leave-In Conditioner Spray For Curly, Natural Hair, Moisturizing Heat Protectant with Castor Oil, 11 fl oz
Title: Love it!
Review: Awesome natural product combined with the curling cream.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Aloe, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I will start by say I love Carols Daughter products. I like to use gel and mousse on my natural curls to get the to be more defined. This gel to foam styler is basically a 2 in 1 gel and mousse but turns the gel into mousse if that makes sense. The bottle is a pretty nice size and a little of the product goes a long way which is great.  The gel/ mousse has aloe in it and smells really good and has a light scent. The product is fast drying which is a huge plus because your hair is not wet for hours. You can literally style and by the time you leave the house it’s dry. Definitely recommend for girls with kinks and curls.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Aloe, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: Thick, sticky bottle and unpleasent fresh smell
Review: I wanted to like this!  I use a similar item from a different company, so I was thrilled to try this.  It is a gel and when it was in my hands it felt a bit soapy - it kinds felt soapy in my hair but yes, it's gel, so it took some maneuvering to get the correct amount.  I also, dislike the smell.  It was fresh smelling , but overpowering for me.  By the 3rd day with this, the pump started sticking so that I had to lift it every time I wanted to pump.  sooooooo..... this didn't work for us.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Aloe, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: here are some key points in my overall experience with this product:- I like the dispenser, its easy to use and control- hair product is slightly sticky feeling like a gel- Nice and fresh light smell- could be used on wet or dry hair- helps to moisturize, de-frizz hair, and hold hair- doesn't make hair crunchy/ hard feeling like some holding stylers- I like that it contains aloe, and no sulfates, parabens, or alcoholoverall good product

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Aloe, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: My daughter loves this product!  We have tried so many other products and this one by far is our favorite! She wants to wear her natural but we weren’t able to find a product that was able to tame her curls. It would start out beautiful then end up a frizzy mess!  But this product actually works by holding and defining her natural curl pattern WITHOUT any shrinkage or frizz. This product actually elongated her beautiful curls and it smells great too!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Aloe, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I use this on my sons curly hair and I love how long it holds the curls. I also love that the next day all I had to do was spritz his hair with a little water and it seemed like it reactivated the gel. Now, my sons hair is short/medium lenth. My daughters long curly hair also looks wonderful with this gel but it didn't last as long. Still though it left my daughters hair looking so good with a perfect curl pattern just..poppin!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Aloe, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I've heard good things about this brand so I got it to try on my daughter's hair and she loves it. It doesn't dry out her hair or weigh it down, and actually does help combat frizzies for up to two whole days. Her hair looks as good, if not better, on day two, and still held up when she overslept and had to wait an extra day before washing. She really likes it. It smells great, too. 4.5 stars.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Aloe, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: My short swavy curly hair loves this gel to foam. I usually use a cream for moisture then gel over that for hold. Applied on towel dried hair it gives moisture and a soft hold. Once diffused dry or air dried and fluffed up a bit it’s perfect. I’m not a huge fan of the scent but it doesn’t linger.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Aloe, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 1.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This stinks. It smells like bitter cucumber (or bitter melon if you know what those are) and I couldn't stand it enough to put more in my hair... Also it did not fade much either. I can't attest to how well it held curl as I didn't use much. Will not use again.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Aloe, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 2.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have used Carol's Daughter products in the past with good results, but this foam mousse styler wasn't a good fit for my hair and I still had tangles while using and I used a generous amount as well. I will stick to their other products instead.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Aloe, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I love the scent of this one. This did a great job with shine and curl definition. It was so easy to use and left my kiddos hair smelling amazing. My kids have curly fine hair.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Aloe, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: The product was great. I used it over my leave in conditioner and it didn’t turn white. Love it has aloe in it but hard we’re super sticky.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Aloe, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I liked how soft and silky my hair felt. My unrelaxed hair was easy to manage and style.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Aloe, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Has to be one of the best products for styling natural hair. I love it

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Aloe, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: Not what I expected from this brand
Review: This product left my hair hatf and crunchy no curl definition and left a crumby mess on my scalp it smells great tho

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Aloe, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I don't use a lot of products to style my hair because I'm not a fan of the weird texture and buildup most of them cause - thankfully I can say I have no issues with this styling mousse! It gives my wavy hair a natural looking bounce without feeling crunchy, dry, powdery or oily. It just looks like my hair but better, and it's so easy to use! No frizz or tangles when I use this product - just an effortless good hair day, every time. It only takes a few minutes to brush it through my hair with my fingers, so it's convenient for wash day or every day! I also appreciate that it's made with natural ingredients like aloe, and has no weird chemical smell like other curly hair products I've tried. I'd definitely buy it again!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Aloe, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: Our FAVORITE hair products!!
Review: We use Carol's Daughter exclusively now for all of our curly hair needs. We have been SO impressed with each and every product we have purchased from shampoo & conditioner to cream hair moisturizer and mousse. You can't go wrong with any of their products. They feel light but strong, last all day, smell fantastic and make your hair feel healthy!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Aloe, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: CD is always super expensive to me but I did like the results of this on 4c hair

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Aloe, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: It took me a little while to figure out the perfect amount needed for my thinner curly hair...but once it was perfected, I 'm pretty sure I won't be needing any other product - EVER! I love this stuff!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Aloe, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: TOP 500 REVIEWER
Review: This is a really interesting product.  I have wavy 2C hair and follow the Curly Girl Method, and this left a hard cast on my hair.  It goes on like a mousse almost, but has a gel-like consistency. It's hard to describe, but I like this hybrid-type product.  A little also goes a long way, so use it sparingly.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Hair Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Aloe and Glycerin, 6.8 fl oz
Title: Just don't do it
Review: This product is not meant for my hair type and it leaves a white residue on hair and scalp

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Hair Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Aloe and Glycerin, 6.8 fl oz
Title: Amazing curls
Review: I'm loving this stuff!  I have 3a- 3b curls and it's so dry!  This ser is amazing and it didn't weigh my hair down!!  Forever a fan

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Rose Water and Glycerin, 6.8 Fl Oz
Title: Not worth it
Review: Didnt do much at all compared to the shampoo and conditioner

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Rose Water and Glycerin, 6.8 Fl Oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I like the cleansing products from this brand, but the stylers tend to be too heavy for my fine but thick, 2C/3A curly/wavy hair. This is a much lighter option that controlled my frizz, defined my waves, and left my hair soft without weighing it down. It's not perfect--my hair is pretty dry, and my ends still needed additional moisture--but it's very good. I'm not keen on the rose scent...it reminds me of my friend's elderly grandmother... but it's fairly light and not really noticeable unless I run my fingers through my hair. I did still use a bit of shine serum/sealer on my split ends because they felt a bit crispy, but I'm overdue for a cut anyway. The rest of my hair felt and moved well after using this, and air-dried to a lovely pattern without sticking out all over. It also made my hair easier to comb and with fewer snags (a miracle, because my hair tangles like crazy). It's not quite as good as the Deva Curl leave-in (but it's a lot less expensive), but it's better than Bumble and Bumble Don't Blow It, so it's a solid 4 star product on my hair.Overall, I'm very happy with this (I just wish it had a different scent).

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Rose Water and Glycerin, 6.8 Fl Oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I usually stick to CGM approved products but willingly try non-cgm as well. This product wasn't in curlscan but curlsbot said it had silicones and hard alcohols (yikes for a leave in).I honestly very rarely use silicones and my hair seems to really like this stuff but since I'm using it, I need to be sure to use a proper shampoo for cleanse when usually I would mostly co-wash. I definitely don't feel that my hair is transformed by this, but they have looked good on all the wash days that I've used it (I haven't tried it on a refresh for fear of weighing down my fine hair)I have 2b/2c fine hair and I have been using this as either the first or second step of the bowl method.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Rose Water and Glycerin, 6.8 Fl Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Since the beginning of my day is busy (toddler & baby), I work full time, and only find time to work out after my last meetings/calls and before picking up the kids I generally shower at night. Which means my curls dry while I'm getting the littles ready and in bed and I then sleep on them. With that being the case, I need to make sure I put something in my hair at night to moisturize my curls and help defend the frizzes!I've been using this for a few nights and I have noticed that my curls keep better. They're not perfectly defined, but they definitely keep much better and my hair does feel more moisturized/the moisture is better locked in. When the description states that it was easy slip and is lightweight it is not lying. The cream serum is really light and easily and effortlessly glides through hair. The smell is nice as well, it smells like rose petals. It helps detangle and leaves your hair feeling soft. This is my after shower go to, so that the next day I just use a spray bottle to dampen my curls and then curl cream to help define and keep the frizz away. Overall, I like this as an added moisturizer and detangled.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Rose Water and Glycerin, 6.8 Fl Oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: My 50-something curly, caucasion hair is over 50% gray, thick, and without added moisture tends to get fuzzy.  I swapped out my usual leave-in with Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer and was happy with the results, although it was not as moisturizing as I had expected it to be. Maybe I'm not using enough?I washed my hair and put this product in my damp hair from mid-shaft to the ends.  I scrunched and let my hair air-dry.  The results were soft with no crunchiness.  My curls were not overly defined, but there was no fuzziness.  The scent of the moisturizer is pleasant and it left my hair smelling good too.I would consider this a medium-weight moisturizer that would be best for thin to normal hair.  Thicker hair types may need to use more products or a different one to achieve optimum moisture retention.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Rose Water and Glycerin, 6.8 Fl Oz
Title: Left my hair more manageable and soft
Review: I have really curly hair and it tends to get frizzy between wash days, so this product has really been helping. I apply a little bit in my hair right out of the shower and then style as usual and I feel that my hair is easier to comb through and that I get less frizz between wash days. It has a nice and creamy consistency and has a nice scent as well. I have been using this every time that I wash my hair and since I only use a little each time it should last a while. For anyone who follows the curly girl method, this product does have drying alcohols in it. Overall, it worked well on my hair and made it manageable and soft.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Rose Water and Glycerin, 6.8 Fl Oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: We've been using this in my daughter's hair, she's biracial and has very coily girls. This adds nice hydration and does seem to help with her curls. I feel like it's actually similar to a face serum in the way that I still use a moisturizer after a serum...and with this serum, and her hair type, I still prefer to add some leave-in conditioner. Also, while I like the Ros rose scent, my daughter isn't a big fan of it but will deal until it's finished- we'll buy once we're out of there's other scents available. I don't feel like I have to use a ton each time so that's a plus- especially since she has a lot of hair!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Rose Water and Glycerin, 6.8 Fl Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: My initial reaction was that I did not like how greasy it felt when it was on my wet hair. You can tell it’s straight glycerin being slathered on. However, once my hair was dried a was very impressed. I could definitely feel a difference in how my hair felt when I hadn’t been using this stuff. Of course I still went in with oils and butter but combing my hair was a lot more easy. Less breakage. Yay!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Rose Water and Glycerin, 6.8 Fl Oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: My 8-year-old gets the worst knots in her hair and this cream does a fantastic job of helping us prevent them. It also makes her hair easier to come through after the shower. When I use it on my hair it leaves my waves soft and feeling moisturized. Plus the scent is very nice too. I'll definitely come back to buy this Carol's again, so of course I recommend you try it. It was an excellent find.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Rose Water and Glycerin, 6.8 Fl Oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I thought this was only for 'wash day' but it turns out that this can help you skip a wash day!  It adds moisture and cuts frizz.  It has a gentle but nice rose scent.It contains silicones and plenty of them based on ingredient placement so if this is something you are avoiding, then this isnt for you.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Rose Water and Glycerin, 6.8 Fl Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I used this on wash day prior to washing and after removing my braids. It made my hair so much easier to detangle with all the cones in it. I like how it smells as it isn’t too strong and smells light. It doesn’t take a lot to make a difference. It seems to soften the hair for sure. Highly recommended.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Rose Water and Glycerin, 6.8 Fl Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I love this product for my daughters curly hair. The cream added moisture and controlled the frizz. I had to be careful because my daughter has fine curly hair and to much of this product would weight her hair down. The scent was tolerable, it is a very strong floral scent.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Rose Water and Glycerin, 6.8 Fl Oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Only took a little bit of this product to tame my curly frizz.The smell is very rosy but not artificial.It did add a lot of softness to my hair.I used instead of hair gel and it worked perfectly.I really like it a lot, and my Mama’s name is Carol!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Rose Water and Glycerin, 6.8 Fl Oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is a nice product with a strong rose scent. It worked okay in my daughters fine curly hair. It is a fairly lightweight product and I think it works best in conjunction with other moisturizing products.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Rose Water and Glycerin, 6.8 Fl Oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: If you like the rose scent then you'll love this cream moisturizer. It works wonders to keep my kids curly hair moisturized and works well on both damp and dry hair.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Rose Water and Glycerin, 6.8 Fl Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Love the way it leaves my hair feeling! Doesn't dry it out and it smells amazing

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Rose Water and Glycerin, 6.8 Fl Oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Smells good makes your hair feel soft and moisturized.  Good value as well

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Rose Water and Glycerin, 6.8 Fl Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Perfect texture and leaves your hair soft. The smell is also great.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Rose Water and Glycerin, 6.8 Fl Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Leaves my hair feeling smooth

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Cream Serum Moisturizer for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Made with Rose Water and Glycerin, 6.8 Fl Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Exactly as described

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Rose Water, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This stuff is pretty cool to use on my curls. It definitely coats the curls really well and leaves them defined, moisturized with shine. It doesn’t weigh my hair down but keep my soft and bouncing. I’m not crazy about the scent as it’s a bit strong.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Rose Water, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: So happy with this! Now I use a volumizer and a set of curly shampoo and conditioner. I also use a curl cream. Adding this has made a huge difference in the look of my curl. I couldn't get my hair to stop frizzing! It didn't care what anti-frizz thing I used. This stuff is amazing because it works to hold your curl like a gel but it incredibly soft and leaves your hair looking so good! I did put it on my scalp and worked down to the ends but I think I will just work it into the hair and not my head. I use a lot of volumizer and I think this is weighing it down and bit but I love the look.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Rose Water, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: You better like the scent of roses. This is very heavily perfumed with the scent of roses. I personally couldn’t stand it. I gave this away after one use.When you push the pump down you get a big amount of foam in your hand. Then you work at through damp hair. And it should leave your hair soft. However in my opinion I felt it left my hair more crunchy. I did not like the product. I gave it away because I didn’t like how it felt in my hair and I didn’t like the foam and I did not like the scent of the roses.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Rose Water, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I currently own about 3 lifetime supplies of hair products. I keep promising myself no more, then I see something that claims to be different and I cave. This product claims to be different.It does have a bit more hold than some other foams I've tried, but just not that much. If you like your hair soft, you'll be happy. I like that crunch, because it tells me my curls are holding up.Also, the perfumey, rose scent is EXTREMELY strong, especially when wet.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Rose Water, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is a gel in the bottle but when you pump it it turns to a foam type mousse in your hand. You scrunch it up. It didn’t leave my hair crunchy at all. I knocked one start off because of how strong the rose scent is. I love rose and would love this scent on the gel if it was mild. This I could smell all day. It did make my hair super soft too. I recommend just be aware of the strong rose scent.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Rose Water, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I personally don't have crazy curly hair but wanted to try this for the time that I need to detangle and have a nice clean looking curly hair. The spray has rosy scent which is pretty strong so if you are sensitive to smell, this might not be a good option for you. It works well to give you soft and smooth finish look curls but has medium hold to it which I personally don't like.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Rose Water, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I really do like this product for my thin curls...it gave my curls a real defined look without frizz or crunch. I did use too much on my first use and figured out that I needed to cut down on the amount, and once I figured that out, all was right in the curly haired world for me.Perfect separated well defined curls with only one product used...perfection!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Rose Water, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I know it's called "Wash Day Delight" but I use it the day after wash day (and beyond) for a bit of a refresh. It works nicely and goes in my hair cleanly. Because it comes out as a foam, it's easier to comb through than gel, but it feels and holds like gel.It has a powerful scent, but I enjoy it and it fades fairly quickly.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Rose Water, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is such a neat product. It smells just like roses and it goes on smooth and really enhances my curls whenever I use it. I’m a big fan of the carol’s daughter products and this is the first time I’ve used this particular product and it’s great so far.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Rose Water, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is a very unique product, it goes from gel to foam. This product as a very strong rose scent. This product did not help with de-tangling hair. It is a very lightweight product, that added a great shine to hair. It did not add much moisture.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Rose Water, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Review: Smells nice… but it left my hair feeling dirty and a tad bit dry.  In fact, I actually rinsed it out of my hair because I just couldn’t stand the way my hair felt. 🤷🏼‍♀️

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Rose Water, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Love this.Smells great.Works great.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Rose Water, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Smells so good and holds my hair together

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Hair Gel to Foam Mousse Styler and Hair Detangler for Curly Hair with Rose Water, Natural-looking Hold, 8.5 fl oz
Title: Too little hold, weird definition
Review: I don't know if it's the product itself or just my hair but this gives me the strangest curls I've ever had no matter how I try to apply it.It defines, but my curls look wonky and tend to lay flat even if the curl itself seems more pronounced. Like they're squashed almost?Additionally, for a foam-gel the hold is practically nothing. It forms a cast but upon scrunching it out it's like I didn't use a gel at all. It gives less hold than my Wella Eimi mousse that's a light to moderate hold.It's really disappointing for this brand because I tend to like the vast majority of their stuff.
